analyzed: indrāya madvā madyaḥ madaḥ sutaḥ divaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ upamaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,086.36a sapta svasāro abhi mātaraḥ śiśuṃ navaṃ jajñānaṃ jenyaṃ vipaścitam /
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ abhi mātaraḥ śiśum navam jajñānam jenyam vipaścitam

original: RV_9,086.36c apāṃ gandharvaṃ divyaṃ nṛcakṣasaṃ somaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase //
analyzed: apām gandharvam divyam nṛ cakṣasam somam viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase

original: RV_9,086.37a īśāna imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujāna indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ /
analyzed: īśānaḥ imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujānaḥ indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ

original: RV_9,086.37c tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtam payas tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ te kṣarantu madhumat ghṛtam payaḥ tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_9,086.38a tvaṃ nṛcakṣā asi soma viśvataḥ pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi /
analyzed: tvam nṛ cakṣāḥ asi soma viśvatas pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi

original: RV_9,086.38c sa naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad vayaṃ syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase //
analyzed: sa naḥ pavasva vasumat hiraṇyavat vayam syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase

original: RV_9,086.39a govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid retodhā indo bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ /
analyzed: go vid pavasva vasu vid hiraṇya vid retaḥ dhāḥ indo bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ

original: RV_9,086.39c tvaṃ suvīro asi soma viśvavit taṃ tvā viprā upa girema āsate //
analyzed: tvam su vīraḥ asi soma viśva vid tam tvā viprāḥ upa girā ime āsate

original: RV_9,086.40a un madhva ūrmir vananā atiṣṭhipad apo vasāno mahiṣo vi gāhate /
analyzed: ud madhvaḥ ūrmiḥ vananāḥ atiṣṭhipat apaḥ vasānaḥ mahiṣaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_9,086.40c rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhat sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayati śravo bṛhat //
analyzed: rājā pavitra rathaḥ vājam āruhat sahasra bhṛṣṭiḥ jayati śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_9,086.41a sa bhandanā ud iyarti prajāvatīr viśvāyur viśvāḥ subharā ahardivi /
analyzed: sa bhandanāḥ ud iyarti prajāvatīḥ viśvāyuḥ viśvāḥ subharāḥ ahardivi

original: RV_9,086.41c brahma prajāvad rayim aśvapastyam pīta indav indram asmabhyaṃ yācatāt //
analyzed: brahma prajāvat rayim aśva pastyam pītaḥ indo indram asmabhyam yācatāt

original: RV_9,086.42a so agre ahnāṃ harir haryato madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ agre ahnām hariḥ haryataḥ madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ

original: RV_9,086.42c dvā janā yātayann antar īyate narā ca śaṃsaṃ daivyaṃ ca dhartari //
analyzed: dvā janā yātayan antar īyate narā ca śaṃsam daivyam ca dhartari

original: RV_9,086.43a añjate vy añjate sam añjate kratuṃ rihanti madhunābhy añjate /
analyzed: añjate vi añjate sam añjate kratum rihanti madhunā abhi añjate

original: RV_9,086.43c sindhor ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate //
analyzed: sindhoḥ ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇam hiraṇya pāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate

original: RV_9,086.44a vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārāty andho arṣati /
analyzed: vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārā ati andhaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,086.44c ahir na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam atyo na krīḷann asarad vṛṣā hariḥ //
analyzed: ahiḥ na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam atyaḥ na krīḍan asarat vṛṣā hariḥ

original: RV_9,086.45a agrego rājāpyas taviṣyate vimāno ahnām bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ /
analyzed: agregaḥ rājā āpyaḥ taviṣyate vimānaḥ ahnām bhuvaneṣu arpitaḥ

original: RV_9,086.45c harir ghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīko arṇavo jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāya okyaḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ ghṛtasnuḥ su dṛśīkaḥ arṇavaḥ jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāye okyaḥ

original: RV_9,086.46a asarji skambho diva udyato madaḥ pari tridhātur bhuvanāny arṣati /
analyzed: asarji skambhaḥ divaḥ udyataḥ madaḥ pari tri dhātuḥ bhuvanāni arṣati

original: RV_9,086.46c aṃśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇo yayuḥ //
analyzed: aṃśum rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇaḥ yayuḥ

original: RV_9,086.47a pra te dhārā aty aṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyato yanti raṃhayaḥ /
analyzed: pra te dhārāḥ ati aṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyataḥ yanti raṃhayaḥ

original: RV_9,086.47c yad gobhir indo camvoḥ samajyasa ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi //
analyzed: yat gobhiḥ indo camvoḥ samajyase ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi

original: RV_9,086.48a pavasva soma kratuvin na ukthyo 'vyo vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam /
analyzed: pavasva soma kratu vid naḥ ukthyaḥ vyaḥ vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam

original: RV_9,086.48c jahi viśvān rakṣasa indo atriṇo bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: jahi viśvān rakṣasaḥ indo atriṇaḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: RV_9,087.01a pra tu drava pari kośaṃ ni ṣīda nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vājam arṣa /
analyzed: pra tu drava pari kośam ni sīda nṛbhiḥ punānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa

original: RV_9,087.01c aśvaṃ na tvā vājinam marjayanto 'cchā barhī raśanābhir nayanti //
analyzed: aśvam na tvā vājinam marjayantaḥ u chā barhī raśanābhiḥ nayanti

original: RV_9,087.02a svāyudhaḥ pavate deva indur aśastihā vṛjanaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ pavate devaḥ induḥ aśasti hā vṛjanam rakṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_9,087.02c pitā devānāṃ janitā sudakṣo viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: pitā devānām janitā su dakṣaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_9,087.03a ṛṣir vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhur dhīra uśanā kāvyena /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhuḥ dhīraḥ uśanā kāvyena

original: RV_9,087.03c sa cid viveda nihitaṃ yad āsām apīcyaṃ guhyaṃ nāma gonām //
analyzed: sa cit viveda nihitam yat āsām apīcyam guhyam nāma gonām

original: RV_9,087.04a eṣa sya te madhumāṃ indra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya te madhumān indra somaḥ vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ

original: RV_9,087.04c sahasrasāḥ śatasā bhūridāvā śaśvattamam barhir ā vājy asthāt //
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ śata sāḥ bhūri dāvā śaśvattamam barhiḥ ā vājī asthāt

original: RV_9,087.05a ete somā abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāyāmṛtāya śravāṃsi /
analyzed: ete somāḥ abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāya amṛtāya śravāṃsi

original: RV_9,087.05c pavitrebhiḥ pavamānā asṛgrañ chravasyavo na pṛtanājo atyāḥ //
analyzed: pavitrebhiḥ pavamānāḥ asṛgram śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanājaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_9,087.06a pari hi ṣmā puruhūto janānāṃ viśvāsarad bhojanā pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: pari hi sma puruhūtaḥ janānām bhojanā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,087.06c athā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṃsi rayiṃ tuñjāno abhi vājam arṣa //
analyzed: athā bhara śyena bhṛta prayāṃsi rayim tuñjānaḥ abhi vājam arṣa

original: RV_9,087.07a eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargo na sṛṣṭo adadhāvad arvā /
analyzed: eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargaḥ na sṛṣṭaḥ adadhāvat arvā

original: RV_9,087.07c tigme śiśāno mahiṣo na śṛṅge gā gavyann abhi śūro na satvā //
analyzed: tigme śiśānaḥ mahiṣaḥ na śṛṅge gāḥ gavyan abhi śūraḥ na satvā

original: RV_9,087.08a eṣā yayau paramād antar adreḥ kūcit satīr ūrve gā viveda /
analyzed: eṣā yayau paramāt antar adreḥ kūcid satīḥ ūrve gāḥ viveda

original: RV_9,087.08c divo na vidyut stanayanty abhraiḥ somasya te pavata indra dhārā //
analyzed: divaḥ na vidyut stanayantī abhraiḥ somasya te pavate indra dhārā

original: RV_9,087.09a uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma saratham punānaḥ /
analyzed: uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma sa ratham punānaḥ

original: RV_9,087.09c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr jīradāno śikṣā śacīvas tava tā upaṣṭut //
analyzed: pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ bṛhatīḥ jīra dāno śikṣa śacīvas tava tāḥ upaṣṭut

original: RV_9,088.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi /
analyzed: ayam somaḥ indra tubhyam sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi

original: RV_9,088.01c tvaṃ ha yaṃ cakṛṣe tvaṃ vavṛṣa indum madāya yujyāya somam //
analyzed: tvam ha yam cakṛṣe tvam vavṛṣe indum madāya yujyāya somam

original: RV_9,088.02a sa īṃ ratho na bhuriṣāḷ ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni /
analyzed: saḥ īm rathaḥ na bhuriṣāh ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni

original: RV_9,088.02c ād īṃ viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vana ūrdhvā navanta //
analyzed: āt īm viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vane ūrdhvāḥ navanta

original: RV_9,088.03a vāyur na yo niyutvāṃ iṣṭayāmā nāsatyeva hava ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: vāyuḥ na yaḥ niyutvān iṣṭa yāmā nāsatyā iva have ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_9,088.03c viśvavāro draviṇodā iva tman pūṣeva dhījavano 'si soma //
analyzed: viśva vāraḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ iva tman pūṣā iva dhī javanaḥ si soma

original: RV_9,088.04a indro na yo mahā karmāṇi cakrir hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūrbhit /
analyzed: indraḥ na yaḥ mahā karmāṇi cakriḥ hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūḥ bhid

original: RV_9,088.04c paidvo na hi tvam ahināmnāṃ hantā viśvasyāsi soma dasyoḥ //
analyzed: paidvaḥ na hi tvam ahi nāmnām hantā viśvasya asi soma dasyoḥ

original: RV_9,088.05a agnir na yo vana ā sṛjyamāno vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu /
analyzed: agniḥ na yaḥ vane ā sṛjyamānaḥ vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu

original: RV_9,088.05c jano na yudhvā mahata upabdir iyarti somaḥ pavamāna ūrmim //
analyzed: janaḥ na yudhvā mahataḥ upabdiḥ iyarti somaḥ pavamānaḥ ūrmim

original: RV_9,088.06a ete somā ati vārāṇy avyā divyā na kośāso abhravarṣāḥ /
analyzed: ete somāḥ ati vārāṇi avyā divyāḥ na kośāsaḥ abhra varṣāḥ

original: RV_9,088.06c vṛthā samudraṃ sindhavo na nīcīḥ sutāso abhi kalaśāṃ asṛgran //
analyzed: vṛthā samudram sindhavaḥ na nīcīḥ sutāsaḥ abhi kalaśām asṛgran

original: RV_9,088.07a śuṣmī śardho na mārutam pavasvānabhiśastā divyā yathā viṭ /
analyzed: śuṣmī śardhaḥ na mārutam pavasva an abhiśastā divyā yathā viś

original: RV_9,088.07c āpo na makṣū sumatir bhavā naḥ sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāṇ na yajñaḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ na makṣū sumatiḥ bhava naḥ sahasra apsāḥ pṛtanāṣāh na yajñaḥ

original: RV_9,088.08a rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma /
analyzed: rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma

original: RV_9,088.08c śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma //
analyzed: śuciḥ tvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma

original: RV_9,089.01a pro sya vahniḥ pathyābhir asyān divo na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamāno akṣāḥ /
analyzed: pra u sya vahniḥ pathyābhiḥ asyān divaḥ na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamānaḥ akṣār

original: RV_9,089.01c sahasradhāro asadan ny asme mātur upasthe vana ā ca somaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ asadat ni asme mātuḥ upasthe vane ā ca somaḥ

original: RV_9,089.02a rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsa ṛtasya nāvam āruhad rajiṣṭhām /
analyzed: rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsaḥ ṛtasya nāvam āruhat rajiṣṭhām

original: RV_9,089.02c apsu drapso vāvṛdhe śyenajūto duha īm pitā duha īm pitur jām //
analyzed: apsu drapsaḥ vāvṛdhe śyena jūtaḥ duhe īm pitā duhe īm pituḥ jām

original: RV_9,089.03a siṃhaṃ nasanta madhvo ayāsaṃ harim aruṣaṃ divo asya patim /
analyzed: siṃham nasanta madhvaḥ ayāsam harim aruṣam divaḥ asya patim

original: RV_9,089.03c śūro yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gā asya cakṣasā pari pāty ukṣā //
analyzed: śūraḥ yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gāḥ asya cakṣasā pari pāti ukṣā

original: RV_9,089.04a madhupṛṣṭhaṃ ghoram ayāsam aśvaṃ rathe yuñjanty urucakra ṛṣvam /
analyzed: madhu pṛṣṭham ghoram ayāsam aśvam rathe yuñjanti uru cakre ṛṣvam

original: RV_9,089.04c svasāra īṃ jāmayo marjayanti sanābhayo vājinam ūrjayanti //
analyzed: svasāraḥ īm jāmayaḥ marjayanti sanābhayaḥ vājinam ūrjayanti

original: RV_9,089.05a catasra īṃ ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ /
analyzed: catasraḥ īm ghṛta duhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ

original: RV_9,089.05c tā īm arṣanti namasā punānās tā īṃ viśvataḥ pari ṣanti pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ īm arṣanti namasā punānāḥ tāḥ īm viśvatas pari santi pūrvīḥ

original: RV_9,089.06a viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā viśvā uta kṣitayo haste asya /
analyzed: viṣṭambhaḥ divaḥ dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ viśvāḥ uta kṣitayaḥ haste asya

original: RV_9,089.06c asat ta utso gṛṇate niyutvān madhvo aṃśuḥ pavata indriyāya //
analyzed: asat te utsaḥ gṛṇate niyutvān madhvaḥ aṃśuḥ pavate indriyāya

original: RV_9,089.07a vanvann avāto abhi devavītim indrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva /
analyzed: vanvan a vātaḥ abhi deva vītim indrāya soma vṛtra hā pavasva

original: RV_9,089.07c śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
analyzed: śagdhi mahaḥ puru ścandrasya rāyaḥ su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_9,090.01a pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣyann ayāsīt /
analyzed: pra hinvānaḥ janitā rodasyaḥ rathaḥ na vājam saniṣyan ayāsīt

original: RV_9,090.01c indraṃ gacchann āyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayor ādadhānaḥ //
analyzed: indram gacchan āyudhā saṃśiśānaḥ viśvā vasu hastayoḥ ādadhānaḥ

original: RV_9,090.02a abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ /
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭham vṛṣaṇam vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_9,090.02c vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūn vi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi //
analyzed: vanā vasānaḥ varuṇaḥ na sindhūn vi ratna dhāḥ dayate vāryāṇi

original: RV_9,090.03a śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvāñ jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni /
analyzed: śūra grāmaḥ sarva vīraḥ saha āvām jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni

original: RV_9,090.03c tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsv aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn //
analyzed: tigma āyudhaḥ kṣipra dhanvā samatsu aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn

original: RV_9,090.04a urugavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasvā purandhī /
analyzed: uru gavyūtiḥ abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasva purandhī

original: RV_9,090.04c apaḥ siṣāsann uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ saṃ cikrado maho asmabhyaṃ vājān //
analyzed: apaḥ siṣāsan uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ sam cikradaḥ mahaḥ asmabhyam vājān

original: RV_9,090.05a matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsīndram indo pavamāna viṣṇum /
analyzed: matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsi indram indo pavamāna viṣṇum

original: RV_9,090.05c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya //
analyzed: matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya

original: RV_9,090.06a evā rājeva kratumāṃ amena viśvā ghanighnad duritā pavasva /
analyzed: eva rājā iva kratumān amena viśvā ghanighnat duritā pavasva

original: RV_9,090.06c indo sūktāya vacase vayo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: indo sūktāya vacase vayaḥ dhāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_9,091.01a asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamo manīṣī /
analyzed: asarji vakvā rathye yathā ājau dhiyā manotā prathamaḥ manīṣī

original: RV_9,091.01c daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye 'janti vahniṃ sadanāny accha //
analyzed: daśa svasāraḥ adhi sāno avye janti vahnim sadanāni accha

original: RV_9,091.02a vītī janasya divyasya kavyair adhi suvāno nahuṣyebhir induḥ /
analyzed: vītī janasya divyasya kavyaiḥ adhi suvānaḥ nahuṣyebhiḥ induḥ

original: RV_9,091.02c pra yo nṛbhir amṛto martyebhir marmṛjāno 'vibhir gobhir adbhiḥ //
analyzed: pra yaḥ nṛbhiḥ amṛtaḥ martyebhiḥ marmṛjānaḥ vibhiḥ gobhiḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_9,091.03a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvad aṃśur asmai pavamāno ruśad īrte payo goḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvat aṃśuḥ asmai pavamānaḥ ruśat īrte payaḥ goḥ

original: RV_9,091.03c sahasram ṛkvā pathibhir vacovid adhvasmabhiḥ sūro aṇvaṃ vi yāti //
analyzed: sahasram ṛkvā pathibhiḥ vacaḥ vid adhvasmabhiḥ sūraḥ aṇvam vi yāti

original: RV_9,091.04a rujā dṛḷhā cid rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punāna inda ūrṇuhi vi vājān /
analyzed: rujā dṛḍhā cit rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punānaḥ indo ūrṇuhi vi vājān

original: RV_9,091.04c vṛścopariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrād upanāyam eṣām //
analyzed: vṛśca upariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrāt upanāyam eṣām

original: RV_9,091.05a sa pratnavan navyase viśvavāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ /
analyzed: sa pratna vat navyase viśva vāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ

original: RV_9,091.05c ye duḥṣahāso vanuṣā bṛhantas tāṃs te aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo //
analyzed: ye duḥṣahāsaḥ vanuṣā bṛhantaḥ tān te aśyāma puru kṛt purukṣo

original: RV_9,091.06a evā punāno apaḥ svar gā asmabhyaṃ tokā tanayāni bhūri /
analyzed: eva punānaḥ apaḥ svar gāḥ asmabhyam tokā tanayāni bhūri

original: RV_9,091.06c śaṃ naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyoṅ naḥ sūryaṃ dṛśaye rirīhi //
analyzed: śam naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyok naḥ sūryam dṛśaye rirīhi

original: RV_9,092.01a pari suvāno harir aṃśuḥ pavitre ratho na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ /
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ hariḥ aṃśuḥ pavitre rathaḥ na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ

original: RV_9,092.01c āpac chlokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devāṃ ajuṣata prayobhiḥ //
analyzed: āpat ślokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devām ajuṣata prayobhiḥ

original: RV_9,092.02a acchā nṛcakṣā asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kavir asya yonau /
analyzed: acchā nṛ cakṣāḥ asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kaviḥ asya yonau

original: RV_9,092.02c sīdan hoteva sadane camūṣūpem agmann ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ //
analyzed: sīdan hotā iva sadane camūṣu upa īm agman ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ

original: RV_9,092.03a pra sumedhā gātuvid viśvadevaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sada eti nityam /
analyzed: pra sumedhāḥ gātu vid viśva devaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sadaḥ eti nityam

original: RV_9,092.03c bhuvad viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantānu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ //
analyzed: bhuvat viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantā anu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ

original: RV_9,092.04a tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ /
analyzed: tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devāḥ trayaḥ ekādaśāsaḥ

original: RV_9,092.04c daśa svadhābhir adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ //
analyzed: daśa svadhābhiḥ adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ

original: RV_9,092.05a tan nu satyam pavamānasyāstu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta /
analyzed: tat nu satyam pavamānasya astu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta

original: RV_9,092.05c jyotir yad ahne akṛṇod u lokam prāvan manuṃ dasyave kar abhīkam //
analyzed: jyotiḥ yat ahne akṛṇot u lokam prāvat manum dasyave kaḥ abhīkam

original: RV_9,092.06a pari sadmeva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīr iyānaḥ /
analyzed: pari sadmā iva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīḥ iyānaḥ

original: RV_9,092.06c somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśāṃ ayāsīt sīdan mṛgo na mahiṣo vaneṣu //
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśān ayāsīt sīdan mṛgaḥ na mahiṣaḥ vaneṣu

original: RV_9,093.01a sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ /
analyzed: sākamukṣaḥ marjayanta svasāraḥ daśa dhīrasya dhītayaḥ dhanutrīḥ

original: RV_9,093.01c hariḥ pary adravaj jāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī //
analyzed: hariḥ pari adravat jāḥ sūryasya droṇam nanakṣe atyaḥ na vājī

original: RV_9,093.02a sam mātṛbhir na śiśur vāvaśāno vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāro adbhiḥ /
analyzed: sam mātṛbhiḥ na śiśuḥ vāvaśānaḥ vṛṣā dadhanve puru vāraḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_9,093.02c maryo na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtaṃ yan saṃ gacchate kalaśa usriyābhiḥ //
analyzed: maryaḥ na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtam yan sam gacchate kalaśe usriyābhiḥ

original: RV_9,093.03a uta pra pipya ūdhar aghnyāyā indur dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ /
analyzed: uta pra pipye ūdhar aghnyāyāḥ induḥ dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ

original: RV_9,093.03c mūrdhānaṃ gāvaḥ payasā camūṣv abhi śrīṇanti vasubhir na niktaiḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhānam gāvaḥ payasā camūṣu abhi śrīṇanti vasubhiḥ na niktaiḥ

original: RV_9,093.04a sa no devebhiḥ pavamāna radendo rayim aśvinaṃ vāvaśānaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ devebhiḥ pavamāna rada indoḥ rayim aśvinam vāvaśānaḥ

original: RV_9,093.04c rathirāyatām uśatī purandhir asmadryag ā dāvane vasūnām //
analyzed: rathirāyatām uśatī purandhiḥ asmadryak ā dāvane vasūnām

original: RV_9,093.05a nū no rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punāno vātāpyaṃ viśvaścandram /
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punānaḥ vātāpyam viśva ścandram

original: RV_9,093.05c pra vanditur indo tāry āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: pra vandituḥ indo tāri āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_9,094.01a adhi yad asmin vājinīva śubha spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ /
analyzed: adhi yat asmin vājinī iva śubhe spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ

original: RV_9,094.01c apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma //
analyzed: apaḥ vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajam na paśu vardhanāya manma

original: RV_9,094.02a dvitā vyūrṇvann amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta /
analyzed: dvitā vyūrṇvan amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta

original: RV_9,094.02c dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāva ṛtāyantīr abhi vāvaśra indum //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāvaḥ ṛtāyantīḥ abhi vāvaśre indum

original: RV_9,094.03a pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūro na ratho bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūraḥ na rathaḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_9,094.03c deveṣu yaśo martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ //
analyzed: deveṣu yaśaḥ martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ puru bhūṣu navyaḥ

original: RV_9,094.04a śriye jātaḥ śriya ā nir iyāya śriyaṃ vayo jaritṛbhyo dadhāti /
analyzed: śriye jātaḥ śriye ā niḥ iyāya śriyam vayaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ dadhāti

original: RV_9,094.04c śriyaṃ vasānā amṛtatvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau //
analyzed: śriyam vasānāḥ amṛta tvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau

original: RV_9,094.05a iṣam ūrjam abhy arṣāśvaṃ gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān /
analyzed: iṣam ūrjam abhi arṣa aśvam gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān

original: RV_9,094.05c viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn //
analyzed: viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn

original: RV_9,095.01a kanikranti harir ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ /
analyzed: kanikranti hariḥ ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ

original: RV_9,095.01c nṛbhir yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gā ato matīr janayata svadhābhiḥ //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijam gāḥ atas matīḥ janayata svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_9,095.02a hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasyeyarti vācam ariteva nāvam /
analyzed: hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasya iyarti vācam aritā iva nāvam

original: RV_9,095.02c devo devānāṃ guhyāni nāmāviṣ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce //
analyzed: devaḥ devānām guhyāni nāma āvis kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce

original: RV_9,095.03a apām ived ūrmayas tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣā īrate somam accha /
analyzed: apām iva id ūrmayaḥ tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣāḥ īrate somam accha

original: RV_9,095.03c namasyantīr upa ca yanti saṃ cā ca viśanty uśatīr uśantam //
analyzed: namasyantīḥ upa ca yanti sam ca ā ca viśanti uśatīḥ uśantam

original: RV_9,095.04a tam marmṛjānam mahiṣaṃ na sānāv aṃśuṃ duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām /
analyzed: tam marmṛjānam mahiṣam na sānau aṃśum duhanti ukṣaṇam giriṣṭhām

original: RV_9,095.04c taṃ vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante trito bibharti varuṇaṃ samudre //
analyzed: tam vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante tritaḥ bibharti varuṇam samudre

original: RV_9,095.05a iṣyan vācam upavakteva hotuḥ punāna indo vi ṣyā manīṣām /
analyzed: iṣyan vācam upavaktā iva hotuḥ punānaḥ indo vi sya manīṣām

original: RV_9,095.05c indraś ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
analyzed: indraḥ ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_9,096.01a pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyann eti harṣate asya senā /
analyzed: pra senā nīḥ śūraḥ agre rathānām gavyan eti harṣate asya senā

original: RV_9,096.01c bhadrān kṛṇvann indrahavān sakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte //
analyzed: bhadrān kṛṇvan indra havān sakhibhyaḥ ā somaḥ vastrā rabhasāni datte

original: RV_9,096.02a sam asya hariṃ harayo mṛjanty aśvahayair aniśitaṃ namobhiḥ /
analyzed: sam asya harim harayaḥ mṛjanti aśva hayaiḥ aniśitam namobhiḥ

original: RV_9,096.02c ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvāṃ enā sumatiṃ yāty accha //
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvān enā sumatim yāti accha

original: RV_9,096.03a sa no deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarasa indrapānaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase indra pānaḥ

original: RV_9,096.03c kṛṇvann apo varṣayan dyām utemām uror ā no varivasyā punānaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṇvan apaḥ varṣayan dyām uta imām uroḥ ā naḥ varivasyā punānaḥ

original: RV_9,096.04a ajītaye 'hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate /
analyzed: ajītaye hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate

original: RV_9,096.04c tad uśanti viśva ime sakhāyas tad ahaṃ vaśmi pavamāna soma //
analyzed: tat uśanti viśve ime sakhāyaḥ tat aham vaśmi pavamāna soma

original: RV_9,096.05a somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ pavate janitā matīnām janitā divaḥ janitā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_9,096.05c janitāgner janitā sūryasya janitendrasya janitota viṣṇoḥ //
analyzed: janitā agneḥ janitā sūryasya janitā indrasya janitā uta viṣṇoḥ

original: RV_9,096.06a brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇām mahiṣo mṛgāṇām /
analyzed: brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣiḥ viprāṇām mahiṣaḥ mṛgāṇām

original: RV_9,096.06c śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitir vanānāṃ somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan //
analyzed: śyenaḥ gṛdhrāṇām svadhitiḥ vanānām somaḥ pavitram ati eti rebhan

original: RV_9,096.07a prāvīvipad vāca ūrmiṃ na sindhur giraḥ somaḥ pavamāno manīṣāḥ /
analyzed: prāvīvipat vācaḥ ūrmim na sindhuḥ giraḥ somaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣāḥ

original: RV_9,096.07c antaḥ paśyan vṛjanemāvarāṇy ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabho goṣu jānan //
analyzed: antar paśyan vṛjanā imā avarāṇi ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabhaḥ goṣu jānan

original: RV_9,096.08a sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvann avātaḥ sahasraretā abhi vājam arṣa /
analyzed: sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvan a vātaḥ sahasra retāḥ abhi vājam arṣa

original: RV_9,096.08c indrāyendo pavamāno manīṣy aṃśor ūrmim īraya gā iṣaṇyan //
analyzed: indrāya indo pavamānaḥ manīṣī aṃśoḥ ūrmim īraya gāḥ iṣaṇyan

original: RV_9,096.09a pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavāta indrāya somo raṇyo madāya /
analyzed: pari priyaḥ kalaśe deva vātaḥ indrāya somaḥ raṇyaḥ madāya

original: RV_9,096.09c sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja indur vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ śata vājaḥ induḥ vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti

original: RV_9,096.10a sa pūrvyo vasuvij jāyamāno mṛjāno apsu duduhāno adrau /
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ vasu vid jāyamānaḥ mṛjānaḥ apsu duduhānaḥ adrau

original: RV_9,096.10c abhiśastipā bhuvanasya rājā vidad gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ //
analyzed: abhiśasti pāḥ bhuvanasya rājā vidat gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,096.11a tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ /
analyzed: tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ

original: RV_9,096.11c vanvann avātaḥ paridhīṃr aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ //
analyzed: vanvan a vātaḥ paridhīn aporṇu vīrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ maghavā bhava naḥ

original: RV_9,096.12a yathāpavathā manave vayodhā amitrahā varivovid dhaviṣmān /
analyzed: yathā apavathāḥ manave vayaḥ dhāḥ amitra hā varivaḥ vid haviṣmān

original: RV_9,096.12c evā pavasva draviṇaṃ dadhāna indre saṃ tiṣṭha janayāyudhāni //
analyzed: eva pavasva draviṇam dadhānaḥ indre sam tiṣṭha janaya āyudhāni

original: RV_9,096.13a pavasva soma madhumāṃ ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye /
analyzed: pavasva soma madhumān ṛtāvāpaḥ vasānaḥ adhi sāno avye

original: RV_9,096.13c ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ //
analyzed: ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamaḥ matsaraḥ indra pānaḥ

original: RV_9,096.14a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva sahasrasā vājayur devavītau /
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ śata dhāraḥ pavasva sahasra sāḥ vājayuḥ deva vītau

original: RV_9,096.14c saṃ sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran na āyuḥ //
analyzed: sam sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_9,096.15a eṣa sya somo matibhiḥ punāno 'tyo na vājī taratīd arātīḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya somaḥ matibhiḥ punānaḥ tyaḥ na vājī tarati id arātīḥ

original: RV_9,096.15c payo na dugdham aditer iṣiram urv iva gātuḥ suyamo na voḷhā //
analyzed: payaḥ na dugdham aditeḥ iṣiram uru iva gātuḥ su yamaḥ na voḷhā

original: RV_9,096.16a svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamāno 'bhy arṣa guhyaṃ cāru nāma /
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamānaḥ bhi arṣa guhyam cāru nāma

original: RV_9,096.16c abhi vājaṃ saptir iva śravasyābhi vāyum abhi gā deva soma //
analyzed: abhi vājam saptiḥ iva śravasya abhi vāyum abhi gāḥ deva soma

original: RV_9,096.17a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim maruto gaṇena /
analyzed: śiśum jajñānam haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim marutaḥ gaṇena

original: RV_9,096.17c kavir gīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan //
analyzed: kaviḥ gīrbhiḥ kāvyena kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram ati eti rebhan

original: RV_9,096.18a ṛṣimanā ya ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām /
analyzed: ṛṣi manāḥ yaḥ ṛṣi kṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām

original: RV_9,096.18c tṛtīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somo virājam anu rājati ṣṭup //
analyzed: tṛtīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somaḥ virājam anu rājati ṣṭubh

original: RV_9,096.19a camūṣac chyenaḥ śakuno vibhṛtvā govindur drapsa āyudhāni bibhrat /
analyzed: camūṣat śyenaḥ śakunaḥ vibhṛtvā go vinduḥ drapsaḥ āyudhāni bibhrat

original: RV_9,096.19c apām ūrmiṃ sacamānaḥ samudraṃ turīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣo vivakti //
analyzed: apām ūrmim sacamānaḥ samudram turīyam dhāma mahiṣaḥ vivakti

original: RV_9,096.20a maryo na śubhras tanvam mṛjāno 'tyo na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām /
analyzed: maryaḥ na śubhraḥ tanvam mṛjānaḥ tyaḥ na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām

original: RV_9,096.20c vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradac camvor ā viveśa //
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradat camvoḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_9,096.21a pavasvendo pavamāno mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇy arṣa /
analyzed: pavasva indo pavamānaḥ mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇi arṣa

original: RV_9,096.21c krīḷañ camvor ā viśa pūyamāna indraṃ te raso madiro mamattu //
analyzed: krīḍam camvoḥ ā viśa pūyamānaḥ indram te rasaḥ madiraḥ mamattu

original: RV_9,096.22a prāsya dhārā bṛhatīr asṛgrann akto gobhiḥ kalaśāṃ ā viveśa /
analyzed: prāsya dhārāḥ bṛhatīḥ asṛgran aktaḥ gobhiḥ kalaśān ā viveśa

original: RV_9,096.22c sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyo vipaścit krandann ety abhi sakhyur na jāmim //
analyzed: sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyaḥ vipaścit krandan eti abhi sakhyuḥ na jāmim

original: RV_9,096.23a apaghnann eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyāṃ na jāro abhigīta induḥ /
analyzed: apaghnan eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyām na jāraḥ abhigītaḥ induḥ

original: RV_9,096.23c sīdan vaneṣu śakuno na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā //
analyzed: sīdan vaneṣu śakunaḥ na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā

original: RV_9,096.24a ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣeva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ /
analyzed: ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣā iva yanti sudughāḥ su dhārāḥ

original: RV_9,096.24c harir ānītaḥ puruvāro apsv acikradat kalaśe devayūnām //
analyzed: hariḥ ānītaḥ puru vāraḥ apsu acikradat kalaśe devayūnām

original: RV_9,097.01a asya preṣā hemanā pūyamāno devo devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam /
analyzed: asya preṣā hemanā pūyamānaḥ devaḥ devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam

original: RV_9,097.01c sutaḥ pavitram pary eti rebhan miteva sadma paśumānti hotā //
analyzed: sutaḥ pavitram pari eti rebhan mitā iva sadma paśumānti hotā

original: RV_9,097.02a bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasāno mahān kavir nivacanāni śaṃsan /
analyzed: bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasānaḥ mahān kaviḥ nivacanāni śaṃsan

original: RV_9,097.02c ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamāno vicakṣaṇo jāgṛvir devavītau //
analyzed: ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ jāgṛviḥ deva vītau

original: RV_9,097.03a sam u priyo mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaro yaśasāṃ kṣaito asme /
analyzed: sam u priyaḥ mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaraḥ yaśasām kṣaitaḥ asme

original: RV_9,097.03c abhi svara dhanvā pūyamāno yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: abhi svara dhanva pūyamānaḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_9,097.04a pra gāyatābhy arcāma devān somaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya /
analyzed: pra gāyata abhi arcāma devān somam hinota mahate dhanāya

original: RV_9,097.04c svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam ā sīdāti kalaśaṃ devayur naḥ //
analyzed: svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam ā sīdāti kalaśam devayuḥ naḥ

original: RV_9,097.05a indur devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya /
analyzed: induḥ devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasra dhāraḥ pavate madāya

original: RV_9,097.05c nṛbhi stavāno anu dhāma pūrvam agann indram mahate saubhagāya //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ stavānaḥ anu dhāma pūrvam agan indram mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_9,097.06a stotre rāye harir arṣā punāna indram mado gacchatu te bharāya /
analyzed: stotre rāye hariḥ arṣa punānaḥ indram madaḥ gacchatu te bharāya

original: RV_9,097.06c devair yāhi sarathaṃ rādho acchā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: devaiḥ yāhi sa ratham rādhaḥ acchā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_9,097.07a pra kāvyam uśaneva bruvāṇo devo devānāṃ janimā vivakti /
analyzed: pra kāvyam uśanā iva bruvāṇaḥ devaḥ devānām janimā vivakti

original: RV_9,097.07c mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāho abhy eti rebhan //
analyzed: mahi vrataḥ śuci bandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāhaḥ abhī eti rebhan

original: RV_9,097.08a pra haṃsāsas tṛpalam manyum acchāmād astaṃ vṛṣagaṇā ayāsuḥ /
analyzed: pra haṃsāsaḥ tṛpalam manyum accha amāt astam vṛṣagaṇāḥ ayāsuḥ

original: RV_9,097.08c āṅgūṣyam pavamānaṃ sakhāyo durmarṣaṃ sākam pra vadanti vāṇam //
analyzed: āṅgūṣyam pavamānam sakhāyaḥ durmarṣam sākam pra vadanti vāṇam

original: RV_9,097.09a sa raṃhata urugāyasya jūtiṃ vṛthā krīḷantam mimate na gāvaḥ /
analyzed: sa raṃhate uru gāyasya jūtim vṛthā krīḍantam mimate na gāvaḥ

original: RV_9,097.09c parīṇasaṃ kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgo divā harir dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ //
analyzed: parīṇasam kṛṇute tigma śṛṅgaḥ divā hariḥ dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ

original: RV_9,097.10a indur vājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invan madāya /
analyzed: induḥ vājī pavate gonyoghāḥ indre somaḥ sahaḥ invan madāya

original: RV_9,097.10c hanti rakṣo bādhate pary arātīr varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā //
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ bādhate pari arātīḥ varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā

original: RV_9,097.11a adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānas tiro roma pavate adridugdhaḥ /
analyzed: adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānaḥ tiras roma pavate adri dugdhaḥ

original: RV_9,097.11c indur indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇo devo devasya matsaro madāya //
analyzed: induḥ indrasya sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ devaḥ devasya matsaraḥ madāya

original: RV_9,097.12a abhi priyāṇi pavate punāno devo devān svena rasena pṛñcan /
analyzed: abhi priyāṇi pavate punānaḥ devaḥ devān svena rasena pṛñcan

original: RV_9,097.12c indur dharmāṇy ṛtuthā vasāno daśa kṣipo avyata sāno avye //
analyzed: induḥ dharmāṇi ṛtuthā vasānaḥ daśa kṣipaḥ avyata sāno avye

original: RV_9,097.13a vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā nadayann eti pṛthivīm uta dyām /
analyzed: vṛṣā śoṇaḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ nadayan eti pṛthivīm uta dyām

original: RV_9,097.13c indrasyeva vagnur ā śṛṇva ājau pracetayann arṣati vācam emām //
analyzed: indrasya iva vagnuḥ ā śṛṇve ājau pracetayan arṣati vācam ā imām

original: RV_9,097.14a rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamāna īrayann eṣi madhumantam aṃśum /
analyzed: rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamānaḥ īrayan eṣi madhumantam aṃśum

original: RV_9,097.14c pavamānaḥ saṃtanim eṣi kṛṇvann indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ saṃtanim eṣi kṛṇvan indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.15a evā pavasva madiro madāyodagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ /
analyzed: eva pavasva madiraḥ madāya udagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_9,097.15c pari varṇam bharamāṇo ruśantaṃ gavyur no arṣa pari soma siktaḥ //
analyzed: pari varṇam bharamāṇaḥ ruśantam gavyuḥ naḥ arṣa pari soma siktaḥ

original: RV_9,097.16a juṣṭvī na indo supathā sugāny urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan /
analyzed: juṣṭvī naḥ indo su pathā sugāni urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan

original: RV_9,097.16c ghaneva viṣvag duritāni vighnann adhi ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye //
analyzed: ghanā iva viṣvak duritāni vighnan adhi snunā dhanva sāno avye

original: RV_9,097.17a vṛṣṭiṃ no arṣa divyāṃ jigatnum iḷāvatīṃ śaṅgayīṃ jīradānum /
analyzed: vṛṣṭim naḥ arṣa divyām jigatnum iḷāvatīm śaṅgayīm jīra dānum

original: RV_9,097.17c stukeva vītā dhanvā vicinvan bandhūṃr imāṃ avarāṃ indo vāyūn //
analyzed: stukā iva vītā dhanva vicinvan bandhūṃr imān avarān indo vāyūn

original: RV_9,097.18a granthiṃ na vi ṣya grathitam punāna ṛjuṃ ca gātuṃ vṛjinaṃ ca soma /
analyzed: granthim na vi sya grathitam punānaḥ ṛjum ca gātum vṛjinam ca soma

original: RV_9,097.18c atyo na krado harir ā sṛjāno maryo deva dhanva pastyāvān //
analyzed: atyaḥ na kradaḥ hariḥ ā sṛjānaḥ maryaḥ deva dhanva pastyāvān

original: RV_9,097.19a juṣṭo madāya devatāta indo pari ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye /
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ madāya devatāte indo pari snunā dhanva sāno avye

original: RV_9,097.19c sahasradhāraḥ surabhir adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ surabhiḥ adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye

original: RV_9,097.20a araśmāno ye 'rathā ayuktā atyāso na sasṛjānāsa ājau /
analyzed: a raśmānaḥ ye rathāḥ a yuktāḥ atyāsaḥ na sasṛjānāsaḥ ājau

original: RV_9,097.20c ete śukrāso dhanvanti somā devāsas tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai //
analyzed: ete śukrāsaḥ dhanvanti somāḥ devāsaḥ tām upa yātā pibadhyai

original: RV_9,097.21a evā na indo abhi devavītim pari srava nabho arṇaś camūṣu /
analyzed: eva naḥ indo abhi deva vītim pari srava nabhaḥ arṇaḥ camūṣu

original: RV_9,097.21c somo asmabhyaṃ kāmyam bṛhantaṃ rayiṃ dadātu vīravantam ugram //
analyzed: somaḥ asmabhyam kāmyam bṛhantam rayim dadātu vīravantam ugram

original: RV_9,097.22a takṣad yadī manaso venato vāg jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣor anīke /
analyzed: takṣat yadī manasaḥ venataḥ vāc jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣoḥ anīke

original: RV_9,097.22c ād īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānā juṣṭam patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum //
analyzed: āt īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānāḥ juṣṭam patim kalaśe gāvaḥ indum

original: RV_9,097.23a pra dānudo divyo dānupinva ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ /
analyzed: pra dānudaḥ divyaḥ dānu pinvaḥ ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ

original: RV_9,097.23c dharmā bhuvad vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhir daśabhir bhāri bhūma //
analyzed: dharmā bhuvat vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhiḥ daśabhiḥ bhāri bhūma

original: RV_9,097.24a pavitrebhiḥ pavamāno nṛcakṣā rājā devānām uta martyānām /
analyzed: pavitrebhiḥ pavamānaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ rājā devānām uta martyānām

original: RV_9,097.24c dvitā bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām ṛtam bharat subhṛtaṃ cārv induḥ //
analyzed: dvitā bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām ṛtam bharat su bhṛtam cāru induḥ

original: RV_9,097.25a arvāṃ iva śravase sātim acchendrasya vāyor abhi vītim arṣa /
analyzed: arvān iva śravase sātim acchā indrasya vāyoḥ abhi vītim arṣa

original: RV_9,097.25c sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīr iṣo dā bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīḥ iṣaḥ dāḥ bhava soma draviṇaḥ vid punānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.26a devāvyo naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayaṃ suvīraṃ dhanvantu somāḥ /
analyzed: devāvyaḥ naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayam su vīram dhanvantu somāḥ

original: RV_9,097.26c āyajyavaḥ sumatiṃ viśvavārā hotāro na diviyajo mandratamāḥ //
analyzed: āyajyavaḥ sumatim viśva vārāḥ hotāraḥ na diviyajaḥ mandratamāḥ

original: RV_9,097.27a evā deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ /
analyzed: eva deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase deva pānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.27c mahaś cid dhi ṣmasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ cit hi smasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.28a aśvo no krado vṛṣabhir yujānaḥ siṃho na bhīmo manaso javīyān /
analyzed: aśvaḥ naḥ kradaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yujānaḥ siṃhaḥ na bhīmaḥ manasaḥ javīyān

original: RV_9,097.28c arvācīnaiḥ pathibhir ye rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasaṃ na indo //
analyzed: arvācīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ ye rajiṣṭhāḥ ā pavasva saumanasam naḥ indo

original: RV_9,097.29a śataṃ dhārā devajātā asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayo mṛjanti /
analyzed: śatam dhārāḥ deva jātāḥ asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayaḥ mṛjanti

original: RV_9,097.29c indo sanitraṃ diva ā pavasva puraetāsi mahato dhanasya //
analyzed: indo sanitram divaḥ ā pavasva puraetā asi mahataḥ dhanasya

original: RV_9,097.30a divo na sargā asasṛgram ahnāṃ rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ na sargāḥ asasṛgram ahnām rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ

original: RV_9,097.30c pitur na putraḥ kratubhir yatāna ā pavasva viśe asyā ajītim //
analyzed: pituḥ na putraḥ kratubhiḥ yatānaḥ ā pavasva viśe asyai ajītim

original: RV_9,097.31a pra te dhārā madhumatīr asṛgran vārān yat pūto atyeṣy avyān /
analyzed: pra te dhārāḥ madhumatīḥ asṛgran vārān yat pūtaḥ atyeṣi avyān

original: RV_9,097.31c pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvo arkaiḥ //
analyzed: pavamāna pavase dhāma gonām jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_9,097.32a kanikradad anu panthām ṛtasya śukro vi bhāsy amṛtasya dhāma /
analyzed: kanikradat anu panthām ṛtasya śukraḥ vi bhāsi amṛtasya dhāma

original: RV_9,097.32c sa indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvāno vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām //
analyzed: saḥ indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvānaḥ vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām

original: RV_9,097.33a divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau /
analyzed: divyaḥ suparṇaḥ va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā deva vītau

original: RV_9,097.33c endo viśa kalaśaṃ somadhānaṃ krandann ihi sūryasyopa raśmim //
analyzed: ā indo viśa kalaśam soma dhānam krandan ihi sūryasya upa raśmim

original: RV_9,097.34a tisro vāca īrayati pra vahnir ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇo manīṣām /
analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ īrayati pra vahniḥ ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇaḥ manīṣām

original: RV_9,097.34c gāvo yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somaṃ yanti matayo vāvaśānāḥ //
analyzed: gāvaḥ yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somam yanti matayaḥ vāvaśānāḥ

original: RV_9,097.35a somaṃ gāvo dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ somaṃ viprā matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ /
analyzed: somam gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ somam viprāḥ matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ

original: RV_9,097.35c somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkās triṣṭubhaḥ saṃ navante //
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkāḥ triṣṭubhaḥ sam navante

original: RV_9,097.36a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāna ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti /
analyzed: eva naḥ soma pariṣicyamānaḥ ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti

original: RV_9,097.36c indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhayā vācaṃ janayā purandhim //
analyzed: indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhaya vācam janaya purandhim

original: RV_9,097.37a ā jāgṛvir vipra ṛtā matīnāṃ somaḥ punāno asadac camūṣu /
analyzed: ā jāgṛviḥ vipraḥ ṛtā matīnām somaḥ punānaḥ asadat camūṣu

original: RV_9,097.37c sapanti yam mithunāso nikāmā adhvaryavo rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ //
analyzed: sapanti yam mithunāsaḥ nikāmāḥ adhvaryavaḥ rathirāsaḥ su hastāḥ

original: RV_9,097.38a sa punāna upa sūre na dhātobhe aprā rodasī vi ṣa āvaḥ /
analyzed: sa punānaḥ upa sūre na dhātā ubhe aprāḥ rodasī vi saḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_9,097.38c priyā cid yasya priyasāsa ūtī sa tū dhanaṃ kāriṇe na pra yaṃsat //
analyzed: priyā cit yasya priyasāsaḥ ūtī sa tu dhanam kāriṇe na pra yaṃsat

original: RV_9,097.39a sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somo mīḍhvāṃ abhi no jyotiṣāvīt /
analyzed: sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somaḥ mīḍhvān abhi naḥ jyotiṣā āvīt

original: RV_9,097.39c yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ svarvido abhi gā adrim uṣṇan //
analyzed: yena naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ svar vidaḥ abhi gāḥ adrim uṣṇan

original: RV_9,097.40a akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmañ janayan prajā bhuvanasya rājā /
analyzed: akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmam janayan prajāḥ bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_9,097.40c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somo vāvṛdhe suvāna induḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somaḥ vāvṛdhe suvānaḥ induḥ

original: RV_9,097.41a mahat tat somo mahiṣaś cakārāpāṃ yad garbho 'vṛṇīta devān /
analyzed: mahat tat somaḥ mahiṣaḥ cakāra apām yat garbhaḥ vṛṇīta devān

original: RV_9,097.41c adadhād indre pavamāna ojo 'janayat sūrye jyotir induḥ //
analyzed: adadhāt indre pavamānaḥ ojaḥ janayat sūrye jyotiḥ induḥ

original: RV_9,097.42a matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.42c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma //
analyzed: matsi śardhaḥ mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma

original: RV_9,097.43a ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantāpāmīvām bādhamāno mṛdhaś ca /
analyzed: ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantā apa amīvām bādhamānaḥ mṛdhaḥ ca

original: RV_9,097.43c abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasābhi gonām indrasya tvaṃ tava vayaṃ sakhāyaḥ //
analyzed: abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasā abhi gonām indrasya tvam tava vayam sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_9,097.44a madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasva utsaṃ vīraṃ ca na ā pavasvā bhagaṃ ca /
analyzed: madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasvaḥ utsam vīram ca naḥ ā pavasva bhagam ca

original: RV_9,097.44c svadasvendrāya pavamāna indo rayiṃ ca na ā pavasvā samudrāt //
analyzed: svadasva indrāya pavamānaḥ indoḥ rayim ca naḥ ā pavasva samudrāt

original: RV_9,097.45a somaḥ suto dhārayātyo na hitvā sindhur na nimnam abhi vājy akṣāḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ sutaḥ dhārayā atyaḥ na hitvā sindhuḥ na nimnam abhi vājī akṣār

original: RV_9,097.45c ā yoniṃ vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam indur gobhir asarat sam adbhiḥ //
analyzed: ā yonim vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam induḥ gobhiḥ asarat sam adbhiḥ

original: RV_9,097.46a eṣa sya te pavata indra somaś camūṣu dhīra uśate tavasvān /
analyzed: eṣa sya te pavate indra somaḥ camūṣu dhīraḥ uśate tavasvān

original: RV_9,097.46c svarcakṣā rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ kāmo na yo devayatām asarji //
analyzed: svar cakṣāḥ rathiraḥ satya śuṣmaḥ kāmaḥ na yaḥ devayatām asarji

original: RV_9,097.47a eṣa pratnena vayasā punānas tiro varpāṃsi duhitur dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pratnena vayasā punānaḥ tiras varpāṃsi duhituḥ dadhānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.47c vasānaḥ śarma trivarūtham apsu hoteva yāti samaneṣu rebhan //
analyzed: vasānaḥ śarma tri varūtham apsu hotā iva yāti samaneṣu rebhan

original: RV_9,097.48a nū nas tvaṃ rathiro deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: nu naḥ tvam rathiraḥ deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.48c apsu svādiṣṭho madhumāṃ ṛtāvā devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā //
analyzed: apsu svādiṣṭhaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satya manmā

original: RV_9,097.49a abhi vāyuṃ vīty arṣā gṛṇāno 'bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: abhi vāyum vītī arṣa gṛṇānaḥ bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.49c abhī naraṃ dhījavanaṃ ratheṣṭhām abhīndraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhum //
analyzed: abhi naram dhī javanam ratheṣṭhām abhi indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum

original: RV_9,097.50a abhi vastrā suvasanāny arṣābhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: abhi vastrā su vasanāni arṣa abhi dhenūḥ su dughāḥ pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.50c abhi candrā bhartave no hiraṇyābhy aśvān rathino deva soma //
analyzed: abhi candrā bhartave naḥ hiraṇyā abhi aśvān rathinaḥ deva soma

original: RV_9,097.51a abhī no arṣa divyā vasūny abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: abhi naḥ arṣa divyā vasūni abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.51c abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāmābhy ārṣeyaṃ jamadagnivan naḥ //
analyzed: abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāma abhi ārṣeyam jamadagni vat naḥ

original: RV_9,097.52a ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indo sarasi pra dhanva /
analyzed: ayā pavā pavasva enā vasūni māṃścatve indo sarasi pra dhanva

original: RV_9,097.52c bradhnaś cid atra vāto na jūtaḥ purumedhaś cit takave naraṃ dāt //
analyzed: bradhnaḥ cit atra vātaḥ na jūtaḥ puru medhaḥ cit takave naram dāt

original: RV_9,097.53a uta na enā pavayā pavasvādhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe /
analyzed: uta naḥ enā pavayā pavasva adhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe

original: RV_9,097.53c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā naiguto vasūni vṛkṣaṃ na pakvaṃ dhūnavad raṇāya //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā naigutaḥ vasūni vṛkṣam na pakvam dhūnavat raṇāya

original: RV_9,097.54a mahīme asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre /
analyzed: mahi ime asya vṛṣa nāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre

original: RV_9,097.54c asvāpayan nigutaḥ snehayac cāpāmitrāṃ apācito acetaḥ //
analyzed: asvāpayat nigutaḥ snehayat ca apa amitrān apa acitaḥ acetaḥ

original: RV_9,097.55a saṃ trī pavitrā vitatāny eṣy anv ekaṃ dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ /
analyzed: sam trī pavitrā vitatāni eṣi anu ekam dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ

original: RV_9,097.55c asi bhago asi dātrasya dātāsi maghavā maghavadbhya indo //
analyzed: asi bhagaḥ asi dātrasya dātā asi maghavā maghavadbhyaḥ indo

original: RV_9,097.56a eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī somo viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā /
analyzed: eṣa viśva vid pavate manīṣī somaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā

original: RV_9,097.56c drapsāṃ īrayan vidatheṣv indur vi vāram avyaṃ samayāti yāti //
analyzed: drapsān īrayan vidatheṣu induḥ vi vāram avyam samayā ati yāti

original: RV_9,097.57a induṃ rihanti mahiṣā adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayo na gṛdhrāḥ /
analyzed: indum rihanti mahiṣāḥ adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayaḥ na gṛdhrāḥ

original: RV_9,097.57c hinvanti dhīrā daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ sam añjate rūpam apāṃ rasena //
analyzed: hinvanti dhīrāḥ daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ sam añjate rūpam apām rasena

original: RV_9,097.58a tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat /
analyzed: tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtam vi cinuyāma śaśvat

original: RV_9,097.58c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_9,098.01a abhi no vājasātamaṃ rayim arṣa puruspṛham /
analyzed: abhi naḥ vāja sātamam rayim arṣa puruspṛham

original: RV_9,098.01c indo sahasrabharṇasaṃ tuvidyumnaṃ vibhvāsaham //
analyzed: indo sahasrabharṇasam tuvi dyumnam vibhvāsaham

original: RV_9,098.02a pari ṣya suvāno avyayaṃ rathe na varmāvyata /
analyzed: pari sya suvānaḥ avyayam rathe na varmā avyata

original: RV_9,098.02c indur abhi druṇā hito hiyāno dhārābhir akṣāḥ //
analyzed: induḥ abhi druṇā hitaḥ hiyānaḥ dhārābhiḥ akṣār

original: RV_9,098.03a pari ṣya suvāno akṣā indur avye madacyutaḥ /
analyzed: pari sya suvānaḥ akṣāḥ induḥ avye mada cyutaḥ

original: RV_9,098.03c dhārā ya ūrdhvo adhvare bhrājā naiti gavyayuḥ //
analyzed: dhārā yaḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvare bhrājā na eti gavyayuḥ

original: RV_9,098.04a sa hi tvaṃ deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe /
analyzed: sa hi tvam deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_9,098.04c indo sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ śatātmānaṃ vivāsasi //
analyzed: indo sahasriṇam rayim śata ātmānam vivāsasi

original: RV_9,098.05a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: vayam te asya vṛtra han vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ

original: RV_9,098.05c ni nediṣṭhatamā iṣaḥ syāma sumnasyādhrigo //
analyzed: ni nediṣṭhatamāḥ iṣaḥ syāma sumnasya adhrigo

original: RV_9,098.06a dvir yam pañca svayaśasaṃ svasāro adrisaṃhatam /
analyzed: dvis yam pañca sva yaśasam svasāraḥ adri saṃhatam

original: RV_9,098.06c priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanty ūrmiṇam //
analyzed: priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanti ūrmiṇam

original: RV_9,098.07a pari tyaṃ haryataṃ harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa /
analyzed: pari tyam haryatam harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa

original: RV_9,098.07c yo devān viśvāṃ it pari madena saha gacchati //
analyzed: yaḥ devān viśvān id pari madena saha gacchati

original: RV_9,098.08a asya vo hy avasā pānto dakṣasādhanam /
analyzed: asya vaḥ hi avasā pāntaḥ dakṣa sādhanam

original: RV_9,098.08c yaḥ sūriṣu śravo bṛhad dadhe svar ṇa haryataḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ sūriṣu śravaḥ bṛhat dadhe svar na haryataḥ

original: RV_9,098.09a sa vāṃ yajñeṣu mānavī indur janiṣṭa rodasī /
analyzed: sa vām yajñeṣu mānavī induḥ janiṣṭa rodasī

original: RV_9,098.09c devo devī giriṣṭhā asredhan taṃ tuviṣvaṇi //
analyzed: devaḥ devī giriṣṭhāḥ asredhan tam tuviṣvaṇi

original: RV_9,098.10a indrāya soma pātave vṛtraghne pari ṣicyase /
analyzed: indrāya soma pātave vṛtra ghne pari sicyase

original: RV_9,098.10c nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade //
analyzed: nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade

original: RV_9,098.11a te pratnāso vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran /
analyzed: te pratnāsaḥ vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran

original: RV_9,098.11c apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātas tāṃ apracetasaḥ //
analyzed: apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātar tām apracetasaḥ

original: RV_9,098.12a taṃ sakhāyaḥ purorucaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tam sakhāyaḥ purorucam yūyam vayam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_9,098.12c aśyāma vājagandhyaṃ sanema vājapastyam //
analyzed: aśyāma vājagandhyam sanema vāja pastyam

original: RV_9,099.01a ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanus tanvanti pauṃsyam /
analyzed: ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanuḥ tanvanti pauṃsyam

original: RV_9,099.01c śukrāṃ vayanty asurāya nirṇijaṃ vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ //
analyzed: śukrām vayanti asurāya nirṇijam vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ

original: RV_9,099.02a adha kṣapā pariṣkṛto vājāṃ abhi pra gāhate /
analyzed: adha kṣapā pariṣkṛtaḥ vājām abhi pra gāhate

original: RV_9,099.02c yadī vivasvato dhiyo hariṃ hinvanti yātave //
analyzed: yadī vivasvataḥ dhiyaḥ harim hinvanti yātave

original: RV_9,099.03a tam asya marjayāmasi mado ya indrapātamaḥ /
analyzed: tam asya marjayāmasi madaḥ yaḥ indra pātamaḥ

original: RV_9,099.03c yaṃ gāva āsabhir dadhuḥ purā nūnaṃ ca sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: yam gāvaḥ āsabhiḥ purā nūnam ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_9,099.04a taṃ gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhy anūṣata /
analyzed: tam gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhī anūṣata

original: RV_9,099.04c uto kṛpanta dhītayo devānāṃ nāma bibhratīḥ //
analyzed: uta u kṛpanta dhītayaḥ devānām nāma bibhratīḥ

original: RV_9,099.05a tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim /
analyzed: tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim

original: RV_9,099.05c dūtaṃ na pūrvacittaya ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: dūtam na pūrvacittaye ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_9,099.06a sa punāno madintamaḥ somaś camūṣu sīdati /
analyzed: sa punānaḥ madintamaḥ somaḥ camūṣu sīdati

original: RV_9,099.06c paśau na reta ādadhat patir vacasyate dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: paśau na retaḥ ādadhat patiḥ vacasyate dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,099.07a sa mṛjyate sukarmabhir devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: sa mṛjyate su karmabhiḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,099.07c vide yad āsu saṃdadir mahīr apo vi gāhate //
analyzed: vide yat āsu saṃdadiḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vi gāhate

original: RV_9,099.08a suta indo pavitra ā nṛbhir yato vi nīyase /
analyzed: sutaḥ indo pavitre ā nṛbhiḥ yataḥ vi nīyase

original: RV_9,099.08c indrāya matsarintamaś camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi //
analyzed: indrāya matsarintamaḥ camūṣu ā ni sīdasi

original: RV_9,100.01a abhī navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam /
analyzed: abhī navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam

original: RV_9,100.01c vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ //
analyzed: vatsam na pūrve āyuni jātam rihanti mātaraḥ

original: RV_9,100.02a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
analyzed: punānaḥ indo ā bhara soma dvibarhasam rayim

original: RV_9,100.02c tvaṃ vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe //
analyzed: tvam vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_9,100.03a tvaṃ dhiyam manoyujaṃ sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ na tanyatuḥ /
analyzed: tvam dhiyam manaḥ yujam sṛja vṛṣṭim na tanyatuḥ

original: RV_9,100.03c tvaṃ vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi //
analyzed: tvam vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi

original: RV_9,100.04a pari te jigyuṣo yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati /
analyzed: pari te jigyuṣaḥ yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati

original: RV_9,100.04c raṃhamāṇā vy avyayaṃ vāraṃ vājīva sānasiḥ //
analyzed: raṃhamāṇā vi avyayam vāram vājī iva sānasiḥ

original: RV_9,100.05a kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā /
analyzed: kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā

original: RV_9,100.05c indrāya pātave suto mitrāya varuṇāya ca //
analyzed: indrāya pātave sutaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: RV_9,100.06a pavasva vājasātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ /
analyzed: pavasva vāja sātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ

original: RV_9,100.06c indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyo madhumattamaḥ //
analyzed: indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,100.07a tvāṃ rihanti mātaro harim pavitre adruhaḥ /
analyzed: tvām rihanti mātaraḥ harim pavitre adruhaḥ

original: RV_9,100.07c vatsaṃ jātaṃ na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi //
analyzed: vatsam jātam na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi

original: RV_9,100.08a pavamāna mahi śravaś citrebhir yāsi raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: pavamāna mahi śravaḥ citrebhiḥ yāsi raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_9,100.08c śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe //
analyzed: śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_9,100.09a tvaṃ dyāṃ ca mahivrata pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe /
analyzed: tvam dyām ca mahi vrata pṛthivīm ca ati jabhriṣe

original: RV_9,100.09c prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā //
analyzed: prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā

original: RV_9,101.01a purojitī vo andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave /
analyzed: purojitī vaḥ andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave

original: RV_9,101.01c apa śvānaṃ śnathiṣṭana sakhāyo dīrghajihvyam //
analyzed: apa śvānam śnathiṣṭana sakhāyaḥ dīrghajihvyam

original: RV_9,101.02a yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,101.02c indur aśvo na kṛtvyaḥ //
analyzed: induḥ aśvaḥ na kṛtvyaḥ

original: RV_9,101.03a taṃ duroṣam abhī naraḥ somaṃ viśvācyā dhiyā /
analyzed: tam duroṣam abhī naraḥ somam viśvācyā dhiyā

original: RV_9,101.03c yajñaṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ //
analyzed: yajñam hinvanti adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,101.04a sutāso madhumattamāḥ somā indrāya mandinaḥ /
analyzed: sutāsaḥ madhumattamāḥ somāḥ indrāya mandinaḥ

original: RV_9,101.04c pavitravanto akṣaran devān gacchantu vo madāḥ //
analyzed: pavitravantaḥ akṣaran devān gacchantu vaḥ madāḥ

original: RV_9,101.05a indur indrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan /
analyzed: induḥ indrāya pavate iti devāsaḥ abruvan

original: RV_9,101.05c vācas patir makhasyate viśvasyeśāna ojasā //
analyzed: vācaḥ patiḥ makhasyate viśvasya īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,101.06a sahasradhāraḥ pavate samudro vācamīṅkhayaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ pavate samudraḥ vācamīṅkhayaḥ

original: RV_9,101.06c somaḥ patī rayīṇāṃ sakhendrasya dive-dive //
analyzed: somaḥ patiḥ rayīṇām sakhā indrasya dive dive

original: RV_9,101.07a ayam pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati /
analyzed: ayam pūṣā rayiḥ bhagaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,101.07c patir viśvasya bhūmano vy akhyad rodasī ubhe //
analyzed: patiḥ viśvasya bhūmanaḥ vi akhyat rodasī ubhe

original: RV_9,101.08a sam u priyā anūṣata gāvo madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ /
analyzed: sam u priyāḥ anūṣata gāvaḥ madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_9,101.08c somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ //
analyzed: somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsaḥ indavaḥ

original: RV_9,101.09a ya ojiṣṭhas tam ā bhara pavamāna śravāyyam /
analyzed: yaḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ tam ā bhara pavamāna śravāyyam

original: RV_9,101.09c yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi rayiṃ yena vanāmahai //
analyzed: yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhi rayim yena vanāmahai

original: RV_9,101.10a somāḥ pavanta indavo 'smabhyaṃ gātuvittamāḥ /
analyzed: somāḥ pavante indavaḥ smabhyam gātu vittamāḥ

original: RV_9,101.10c mitrāḥ suvānā arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ //
analyzed: mitrāḥ suvānāḥ arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,101.11a suṣvāṇāso vy adribhiś citānā gor adhi tvaci /
analyzed: suṣvāṇāsaḥ vi adribhiḥ citānāḥ goḥ adhi tvaci

original: RV_9,101.11c iṣam asmabhyam abhitaḥ sam asvaran vasuvidaḥ //
analyzed: iṣam asmabhyam abhitas sam asvaran vasu vidaḥ

original: RV_9,101.12a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
analyzed: ete pūtāḥ vipaścitaḥ somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_9,101.12c sūryāso na darśatāso jigatnavo dhruvā ghṛte //
analyzed: sūryāsaḥ na darśatāsaḥ jigatnavaḥ dhruvāḥ ghṛte

original: RV_9,101.13a pra sunvānasyāndhaso marto na vṛta tad vacaḥ /
analyzed: pra sunvānasya andhasaḥ martaḥ na vṛta tat vacaḥ

original: RV_9,101.13c apa śvānam arādhasaṃ hatā makhaṃ na bhṛgavaḥ //
analyzed: apa śvānam arādhasam hatāḥ makham na bhṛgavaḥ

original: RV_9,101.14a ā jāmir atke avyata bhuje na putra oṇyoḥ /
analyzed: ā jāmiḥ atke avyata bhuje na putraḥ oṇyoḥ

original: RV_9,101.14c saraj jāro na yoṣaṇāṃ varo na yonim āsadam //
analyzed: sarat jāraḥ na yoṣaṇām varaḥ na yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,101.15a sa vīro dakṣasādhano vi yas tastambha rodasī /
analyzed: sa vīraḥ dakṣa sādhanaḥ vi yaḥ tastambha rodasī

original: RV_9,101.15c hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhā na yonim āsadam //
analyzed: hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhāḥ na yonim āsadam

original: RV_9,101.16a avyo vārebhiḥ pavate somo gavye adhi tvaci /
analyzed: avyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate somaḥ gavye adhi tvaci

original: RV_9,101.16c kanikradad vṛṣā harir indrasyābhy eti niṣkṛtam //
analyzed: kanikradat vṛṣā hariḥ indrasya abhī eti niṣkṛtam

original: RV_9,102.01a krāṇā śiśur mahīnāṃ hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim /
analyzed: krāṇā śiśuḥ mahīnām hinvan ṛtasya dīdhitim

original: RV_9,102.01c viśvā pari priyā bhuvad adha dvitā //
analyzed: viśvā pari priyā bhuvat adha dvitā

original: RV_9,102.02a upa tritasya pāṣyor abhakta yad guhā padam /
analyzed: upa tritasya pāṣyoḥ abhakta yat guhā padam

original: RV_9,102.02c yajñasya sapta dhāmabhir adha priyam //
analyzed: yajñasya sapta dhāmabhiḥ adha priyam

original: RV_9,102.03a trīṇi tritasya dhārayā pṛṣṭheṣv erayā rayim /
analyzed: trīṇi tritasya dhāraya pṛṣṭheṣu ā iraya rayim

original: RV_9,102.03c mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ //
analyzed: mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ

original: RV_9,102.04a jajñānaṃ sapta mātaro vedhām aśāsata śriye /
analyzed: jajñānam sapta mātaraḥ vedhām aśāsata śriye

original: RV_9,102.04c ayaṃ dhruvo rayīṇāṃ ciketa yat //
analyzed: ayam dhruvaḥ rayīṇām ciketa yat

original: RV_9,102.05a asya vrate sajoṣaso viśve devāso adruhaḥ /
analyzed: asya vrate sajoṣasaḥ viśve devāsaḥ adruhaḥ

original: RV_9,102.05c spārhā bhavanti rantayo juṣanta yat //
analyzed: spārhāḥ bhavanti rantayaḥ juṣanta yat

original: RV_9,102.06a yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdho dṛśe cārum ajījanan /
analyzed: yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdhaḥ dṛśe cārum ajījanan

original: RV_9,102.06c kavim maṃhiṣṭham adhvare puruspṛham //
analyzed: kavim maṃhiṣṭham adhvare puruspṛham

original: RV_9,102.07a samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
analyzed: samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_9,102.07c tanvānā yajñam ānuṣag yad añjate //
analyzed: tanvānāḥ yajñam ānuṣak yat añjate

original: RV_9,102.08a kratvā śukrebhir akṣabhir ṛṇor apa vrajaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: kratvā śukrebhiḥ akṣabhiḥ ṛṇoḥ apa vrajam divaḥ

original: RV_9,102.08c hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim prādhvare //
analyzed: hinvan ṛtasya dīdhitim pra adhvare

original: RV_9,103.01a pra punānāya vedhase somāya vaca udyatam /
analyzed: pra punānāya vedhase somāya vacaḥ udyatam

original: RV_9,103.01c bhṛtiṃ na bharā matibhir jujoṣate //
analyzed: bhṛtim na bhara matibhiḥ jujoṣate

original: RV_9,103.02a pari vārāṇy avyayā gobhir añjāno arṣati /
analyzed: pari vārāṇi avyayā gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣati

original: RV_9,103.02c trī ṣadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ //
analyzed: trī sadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ

original: RV_9,103.03a pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati /
analyzed: pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati

original: RV_9,103.03c abhi vāṇīr ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta nūṣata //
analyzed: abhi vāṇīḥ ṛṣīṇām sapta nūṣata

original: RV_9,103.04a pari ṇetā matīnāṃ viśvadevo adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: pari netā matīnām viśva devaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_9,103.04c somaḥ punānaś camvor viśad dhariḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ camvoḥ viśat hariḥ

original: RV_9,103.05a pari daivīr anu svadhā indreṇa yāhi saratham /
analyzed: pari daivīḥ anu svadhāḥ indreṇa yāhi sa ratham

original: RV_9,103.05c punāno vāghad vāghadbhir amartyaḥ //
analyzed: punānaḥ vāghat vāghadbhiḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_9,103.06a pari saptir na vājayur devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: pari saptiḥ na vājayuḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,103.06c vyānaśiḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati //
analyzed: vyānaśiḥ pavamānaḥ vi dhāvati

original: RV_9,104.01a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata punānāya pra gāyata /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā ni sīdata punānāya pra gāyata

original: RV_9,104.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye //
analyzed: śiśum na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye

original: RV_9,104.02a sam ī vatsaṃ na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gayasādhanam /
analyzed: sam ī vatsam na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjata gaya sādhanam

original: RV_9,104.02c devāvyam madam abhi dviśavasam //
analyzed: devāvyam madam abhi dvi śavasam

original: RV_9,104.03a punātā dakṣasādhanaṃ yathā śardhāya vītaye /
analyzed: punāta dakṣa sādhanam yathā śardhāya vītaye

original: RV_9,104.03c yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ //
analyzed: yathā mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ

original: RV_9,104.04a asmabhyaṃ tvā vasuvidam abhi vāṇīr anūṣata /
analyzed: asmabhyam tvā vasu vidam abhi vāṇīḥ anūṣata

original: RV_9,104.04c gobhiṣ ṭe varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi //
analyzed: gobhiḥ te varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi

original: RV_9,104.05a sa no madānām pata indo devapsarā asi /
analyzed: sa naḥ madānām pate indo deva psarāḥ asi

original: RV_9,104.05c sakheva sakhye gātuvittamo bhava //
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye gātu vittamaḥ bhava

original: RV_9,104.06a sanemi kṛdhy asmad ā rakṣasaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam /
analyzed: sanemi kṛdhī asmat ā rakṣasam kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_9,104.06c apādevaṃ dvayum aṃho yuyodhi naḥ //
analyzed: dvayum aṃhaḥ yuyodhi naḥ

original: RV_9,105.01a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyo madāya punānam abhi gāyata /
analyzed: tam vaḥ sakhāyaḥ madāya punānam abhi gāyata

original: RV_9,105.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ //
analyzed: śiśum na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ

original: RV_9,105.02a saṃ vatsa iva mātṛbhir indur hinvāno ajyate /
analyzed: sam vatsaḥ iva mātṛbhiḥ induḥ hinvānaḥ ajyate

original: RV_9,105.02c devāvīr mado matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: devāvīḥ madaḥ matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_9,105.03a ayaṃ dakṣāya sādhano 'yaṃ śardhāya vītaye /
analyzed: ayam dakṣāya sādhanaḥ yam śardhāya vītaye

original: RV_9,105.03c ayaṃ devebhyo madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: ayam devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,105.04a goman na indo aśvavat sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva /
analyzed: gomat naḥ indo aśvavat sutaḥ su dakṣa dhanva

original: RV_9,105.04c śuciṃ te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam //
analyzed: śucim te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam

original: RV_9,105.05a sa no harīṇām pata indo devapsarastamaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ harīṇām pate indo deva psarastamaḥ

original: RV_9,105.05c sakheva sakhye naryo ruce bhava //
analyzed: sakhā iva sakhye naryaḥ ruce bhava

original: RV_9,105.06a sanemi tvam asmad āṃ adevaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam /
analyzed: sanemi tvam asmat ām adevam kam cit atriṇam

original: RV_9,105.06c sāhvāṃ indo pari bādho apa dvayum //
analyzed: sāhvām indo pari bādhaḥ apa dvayum

original: RV_9,106.01a indram accha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ /
analyzed: indram accha sutāḥ ime vṛṣaṇam yantu harayaḥ

original: RV_9,106.01c śruṣṭī jātāsa indavaḥ svarvidaḥ //
analyzed: śruṣṭī jātāsaḥ indavaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,106.02a ayam bharāya sānasir indrāya pavate sutaḥ /
analyzed: ayam bharāya sānasiḥ indrāya pavate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,106.02c somo jaitrasya cetati yathā vide //
analyzed: somaḥ jaitrasya cetati yathā vide

original: RV_9,106.03a asyed indro madeṣv ā grābhaṃ gṛbhṇīta sānasim /
analyzed: asya id indraḥ madeṣu ā grābham gṛbhṇīta sānasim

original: RV_9,106.03c vajraṃ ca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit //
analyzed: vajram ca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit

original: RV_9,106.04a pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvir indrāyendo pari srava /
analyzed: pra dhanva soma jāgṛviḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,106.04c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam ā bharā svarvidam //
analyzed: dyumantam śuṣmam ā bhara svar vidam

original: RV_9,106.05a indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ /
analyzed: indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_9,106.05c sahasrayāmā pathikṛd vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra yāmā pathikṛt vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,106.06a asmabhyaṃ gātuvittamo devebhyo madhumattamaḥ /
analyzed: asmabhyam gātu vittamaḥ devebhyaḥ madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,106.06c sahasraṃ yāhi pathibhiḥ kanikradat //
analyzed: sahasram yāhi pathibhiḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,106.07a pavasva devavītaya indo dhārābhir ojasā /
analyzed: pavasva deva vītaye indo dhārābhiḥ ojasā

original: RV_9,106.07c ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ //
analyzed: ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ

original: RV_9,106.08a tava drapsā udapruta indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ /
analyzed: tava drapsāḥ uda prutaḥ indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ

original: RV_9,106.08c tvāṃ devāso amṛtāya kam papuḥ //
analyzed: tvām devāsaḥ amṛtāya kam papuḥ

original: RV_9,106.09a ā naḥ sutāsa indavaḥ punānā dhāvatā rayim /
analyzed: ā naḥ sutāsaḥ indavaḥ punānāḥ dhāvata rayim

original: RV_9,106.09c vṛṣṭidyāvo rītyāpaḥ svarvidaḥ //
analyzed: rīti apaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,106.10a somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati /
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ ūrmiṇā avyaḥ vāram vi dhāvati

original: RV_9,106.10c agre vācaḥ pavamānaḥ kanikradat //
analyzed: agre vācaḥ pavamānaḥ kanikradat

original: RV_9,106.11a dhībhir hinvanti vājinaṃ vane krīḷantam atyavim /
analyzed: dhībhiḥ hinvanti vājinam vane krīḍantam atyavim

original: RV_9,106.11c abhi tripṛṣṭham matayaḥ sam asvaran //
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭham matayaḥ sam asvaran

original: RV_9,106.12a asarji kalaśāṃ abhi mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ /
analyzed: asarji kalaśām abhi mīḍhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ

original: RV_9,106.12c punāno vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadat //
analyzed: punānaḥ vācam janayan asiṣyadat

original: RV_9,106.13a pavate haryato harir ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā /
analyzed: pavate haryataḥ hariḥ ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā

original: RV_9,106.13c abhyarṣan stotṛbhyo vīravad yaśaḥ //
analyzed: abhyarṣan stotṛbhyaḥ vīravat yaśaḥ

original: RV_9,106.14a ayā pavasva devayur madhor dhārā asṛkṣata /
analyzed: ayā pavasva devayuḥ madhoḥ dhārāḥ asṛkṣata

original: RV_9,106.14c rebhan pavitram pary eṣi viśvataḥ //
analyzed: rebhan pavitram pari eṣi viśvatas

original: RV_9,107.01a parīto ṣiñcatā sutaṃ somo ya uttamaṃ haviḥ /
analyzed: pari itas siñcata sutam somaḥ yaḥ uttamam haviḥ

original: RV_9,107.01c dadhanvāṃ yo naryo apsv antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ //
analyzed: dadhanvām yaḥ naryaḥ apsu antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ

original: RV_9,107.02a nūnam punāno 'vibhiḥ pari sravādabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ /
analyzed: nūnam punānaḥ vibhiḥ pari srava adabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ

original: RV_9,107.02c sute cit tvāpsu madāmo andhasā śrīṇanto gobhir uttaram //
analyzed: sute cit tvā apsu madāmaḥ andhasā śrīṇantaḥ gobhiḥ uttaram

original: RV_9,107.03a pari suvānaś cakṣase devamādanaḥ kratur indur vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: pari suvānaḥ cakṣase deva mādanaḥ kratuḥ induḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,107.04a punānaḥ soma dhārayāpo vasāno arṣasi /
analyzed: punānaḥ soma dhārayā apaḥ vasānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_9,107.04c ā ratnadhā yonim ṛtasya sīdasy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ //
analyzed: ā ratna dhāḥ yonim ṛtasya sīdasi utsaḥ deva hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_9,107.05a duhāna ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnaṃ sadhastham āsadat /
analyzed: duhānaḥ ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnam sadhastham āsadat

original: RV_9,107.05c āpṛcchyaṃ dharuṇaṃ vājy arṣati nṛbhir dhūto vicakṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: āpṛcchyam dharuṇam vājī arṣati nṛbhiḥ dhūtaḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,107.06a punānaḥ soma jāgṛvir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ /
analyzed: punānaḥ soma jāgṛviḥ avyaḥ vāre pari priyaḥ

original: RV_9,107.06c tvaṃ vipro abhavo 'ṅgirastamo madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ //
analyzed: tvam vipraḥ abhavaḥ ṅgirastamaḥ madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ

original: RV_9,107.07a somo mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittama ṛṣir vipro vicakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ mīḍhvān pavate gātu vittamaḥ ṛṣiḥ vipraḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_9,107.07c tvaṃ kavir abhavo devavītama ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi //
analyzed: tvam kaviḥ abhavaḥ deva vītamaḥ ā sūryam rohayaḥ divi

original: RV_9,107.08a soma u ṣuvāṇaḥ sotṛbhir adhi ṣṇubhir avīnām /
analyzed: somaḥ u suvānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ adhi snubhiḥ avīnām

original: RV_9,107.08c aśvayeva haritā yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā //
analyzed: aśvayā iva haritā yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā

original: RV_9,107.09a anūpe gomān gobhir akṣāḥ somo dugdhābhir akṣāḥ /
analyzed: anūpe gomān gobhiḥ akṣāḥ somaḥ dugdhābhiḥ akṣāḥ

original: RV_9,107.09c samudraṃ na saṃvaraṇāny agman mandī madāya tośate //
analyzed: samudram na saṃvaraṇāni agman mandī madāya tośate

original: RV_9,107.10a ā soma suvāno adribhis tiro vārāṇy avyayā /
analyzed: ā soma suvānaḥ adribhiḥ tiras vārāṇi avyayā

original: RV_9,107.10c jano na puri camvor viśad dhariḥ sado vaneṣu dadhiṣe //
analyzed: janaḥ na puri camvoḥ viśat hariḥ sadaḥ vaneṣu dadhiṣe

original: RV_9,107.11a sa māmṛje tiro aṇvāni meṣyo mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ /
analyzed: sa māmṛje tiras aṇvāni meṣyaḥ mīḍhe saptiḥ na vājayuḥ

original: RV_9,107.11c anumādyaḥ pavamāno manīṣibhiḥ somo viprebhir ṛkvabhiḥ //
analyzed: anumādyaḥ pavamānaḥ manīṣibhiḥ somaḥ viprebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_9,107.12a pra soma devavītaye sindhur na pipye arṇasā /
analyzed: pra soma deva vītaye sindhuḥ na pipye arṇasā

original: RV_9,107.12c aṃśoḥ payasā madiro na jāgṛvir acchā kośam madhuścutam //
analyzed: aṃśoḥ payasā madiraḥ na jāgṛviḥ acchā kośam madhuścutam

original: RV_9,107.13a ā haryato arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnur na marjyaḥ /
analyzed: ā haryataḥ arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnuḥ na marjyaḥ

original: RV_9,107.13c tam īṃ hinvanty apaso yathā rathaṃ nadīṣv ā gabhastyoḥ //
analyzed: tam īm hinvanti apasaḥ yathā ratham nadīṣu ā gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,107.14a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam /
analyzed: abhi somāsaḥ āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam

original: RV_9,107.14c samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇo matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ //
analyzed: samudrasya adhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇaḥ matsarāsaḥ svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,107.15a tarat samudram pavamāna ūrmiṇā rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat /
analyzed: tarat samudram pavamānaḥ ūrmiṇā rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_9,107.15c arṣan mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvāna ṛtam bṛhat //
analyzed: arṣat mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvānaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_9,107.16a nṛbhir yemāno haryato vicakṣaṇo rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ haryataḥ vicakṣaṇaḥ rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ

original: RV_9,107.17a indrāya pavate madaḥ somo marutvate sutaḥ /
analyzed: indrāya pavate madaḥ somaḥ marutvate sutaḥ

original: RV_9,107.17c sahasradhāro aty avyam arṣati tam ī mṛjanty āyavaḥ //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ ati avyam arṣati tam ī mṛjanti āyavaḥ

original: RV_9,107.18a punānaś camū janayan matiṃ kaviḥ somo deveṣu raṇyati /
analyzed: punānaḥ camū janayan matim kaviḥ somaḥ deveṣu raṇyati

original: RV_9,107.18c apo vasānaḥ pari gobhir uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣv avyata //
analyzed: apaḥ vasānaḥ pari gobhiḥ uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣu avyata

original: RV_9,107.19a tavāhaṃ soma rāraṇa sakhya indo dive-dive /
analyzed: tava aham soma rāraṇa sakhye indo dive dive

original: RV_9,107.19c purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīṃr ati tāṃ ihi //
analyzed: purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīn ati tām ihi

original: RV_9,107.20a utāhaṃ naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhra ūdhani /
analyzed: uta aham naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhro ūdhani

original: RV_9,107.20c ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paraḥ śakunā iva paptima //
analyzed: ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paras śakunāḥ iva paptima

original: RV_9,107.21a mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya samudre vācam invasi /
analyzed: mṛjyamānaḥ su hastya samudre vācam invasi

original: RV_9,107.21c rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham pavamānābhy arṣasi //
analyzed: rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham pavamāna abhi arṣasi

original: RV_9,107.22a mṛjāno vāre pavamāno avyaye vṛṣāva cakrado vane /
analyzed: mṛjānaḥ vāre pavamānaḥ avyaye vṛṣā ava cakradaḥ vane

original: RV_9,107.22c devānāṃ soma pavamāna niṣkṛtaṃ gobhir añjāno arṣasi //
analyzed: devānām soma pavamāna niṣkṛtam gobhiḥ añjānaḥ arṣasi

original: RV_9,107.23a pavasva vājasātaye 'bhi viśvāni kāvyā /
analyzed: pavasva vājasātaye bhi viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_9,107.23c tvaṃ samudram prathamo vi dhārayo devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ //
analyzed: tvam samudram prathamaḥ vi dhārayaḥ devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ

original: RV_9,107.24a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ rajo divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ /
analyzed: sa tu pavasva pari pārthivam rajaḥ divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ

original: RV_9,107.24c tvāṃ viprāso matibhir vicakṣaṇa śubhraṃ hinvanti dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: tvām viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ vicakṣaṇa śubhram hinvanti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_9,107.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata pavitram ati dhārayā /
analyzed: pavamānāḥ asṛkṣata pavitram ati dhārayā

original: RV_9,107.25c marutvanto matsarā indriyā hayā medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca //
analyzed: marutvantaḥ matsarāḥ indriyāḥ hayāḥ medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca

original: RV_9,107.26a apo vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣatīndur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati induḥ hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_9,107.26c janayañ jyotir mandanā avīvaśad gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam //
analyzed: janayam jyotiḥ mandanāḥ avīvaśat gāḥ kṛṇvānaḥ na nirṇijam

original: RV_9,108.01a pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ /
analyzed: pavasva madhumattamaḥ indrāya soma kratu vittamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_9,108.01c mahi dyukṣatamo madaḥ //
analyzed: mahi dyukṣatamaḥ madaḥ

original: RV_9,108.02a yasya te pītvā vṛṣabho vṛṣāyate 'sya pītā svarvidaḥ /
analyzed: yasya te pītvā vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣāyate sya pītā svar vidaḥ

original: RV_9,108.02c sa supraketo abhy akramīd iṣo 'cchā vājaṃ naitaśaḥ //
analyzed: sa su praketaḥ abhī akramīt iṣā u ccha vājam na etaśaḥ

original: RV_9,108.03a tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi aṅga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,108.03c amṛtatvāya ghoṣayaḥ //
analyzed: amṛta tvāya ghoṣayaḥ

original: RV_9,108.04a yenā navagvo dadhyaṅṅ aporṇute yena viprāsa āpire /
analyzed: yena navagvaḥ dadhyaṅ aporṇute yena viprāsaḥ āpire

original: RV_9,108.04c devānāṃ sumne amṛtasya cāruṇo yena śravāṃsy ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: devānām sumne amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ yena śravāṃsi ānaśuḥ

original: RV_9,108.05a eṣa sya dhārayā suto 'vyo vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa sya dhārayā sutaḥ vyaḥ vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ

original: RV_9,108.05c krīḷann ūrmir apām iva //
analyzed: krīḍan ūrmiḥ apām iva

original: RV_9,108.06a ya usriyā apyā antar aśmano nir gā akṛntad ojasā /
analyzed: yaḥ usriyāḥ apyāḥ antar aśmanaḥ niḥ gāḥ akṛntat ojasā

original: RV_9,108.06c abhi vrajaṃ tatniṣe gavyam aśvyaṃ varmīva dhṛṣṇav ā ruja //
analyzed: abhi vrajam tatniṣe gavyam aśvyam varmī iva dhṛṣṇo ā ruja

original: RV_9,108.07a ā sotā pari ṣiñcatāśvaṃ na stomam apturaṃ rajasturam /
analyzed: ā sotā pari siñcata aśvam na stomam ap turam rajaḥ turam

original: RV_9,108.07c vanakrakṣam udaprutam //
analyzed: vana krakṣam uda prutam

original: RV_9,108.08a sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabham payovṛdham priyaṃ devāya janmane /
analyzed: sahasra dhāram vṛṣabham payaḥ vṛdham priyam devāya janmane

original: RV_9,108.08c ṛtena ya ṛtajāto vivāvṛdhe rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat //
analyzed: ṛtena yaḥ ṛta jātaḥ vivāvṛdhe rājā devaḥ ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_9,108.09a abhi dyumnam bṛhad yaśa iṣas pate didīhi deva devayuḥ /
analyzed: abhi dyumnam bṛhat yaśaḥ iṣaḥ pate didīhi deva devayuḥ

original: RV_9,108.09c vi kośam madhyamaṃ yuva //
analyzed: vi kośam madhyamam yuva

original: RV_9,108.10a ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ suto viśāṃ vahnir na viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: ā vacyasva su dakṣa camvoḥ sutaḥ viśām vahniḥ na viśpatiḥ

original: RV_9,108.10c vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pavasva rītim apāṃ jinvā gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṭim divaḥ pavasva rītim apām jinva gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ

original: RV_9,108.11a etam u tyam madacyutaṃ sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ divo duhuḥ /
analyzed: etam u tyam mada cyutam sahasra dhāram vṛṣabham divaḥ duhuḥ

original: RV_9,108.11c viśvā vasūni bibhratam //
analyzed: viśvā vasūni bibhratam

original: RV_9,108.12a vṛṣā vi jajñe janayann amartyaḥ pratapañ jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā vi jajñe janayan amartyaḥ pratapam jyotiṣā tamaḥ

original: RV_9,108.12c sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhir nirṇijaṃ dadhe tridhātv asya daṃsasā //
analyzed: sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhiḥ nirṇijam dadhe tri dhātu asya daṃsasā

original: RV_9,108.13a sa sunve yo vasūnāṃ yo rāyām ānetā ya iḷānām /
analyzed: sa sunve yaḥ vasūnām yaḥ rāyām ānetā yaḥ iḷānām

original: RV_9,108.13c somo yaḥ sukṣitīnām //
analyzed: somaḥ yaḥ su kṣitīnām

original: RV_9,108.14a yasya na indraḥ pibād yasya maruto yasya vāryamaṇā bhagaḥ /
analyzed: yasya naḥ indraḥ pibāt yasya marutaḥ yasya vā aryamaṇā bhagaḥ

original: RV_9,108.14c ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmaha endram avase mahe //
analyzed: ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmahe ā indram avase mahe

original: RV_9,108.15a indrāya soma pātave nṛbhir yataḥ svāyudho madintamaḥ /
analyzed: indrāya soma pātave nṛbhiḥ yataḥ su āyudhaḥ madintamaḥ

original: RV_9,108.15c pavasva madhumattamaḥ //
analyzed: pavasva madhumattamaḥ

original: RV_9,108.16a indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: indrasya hārdi soma dhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ

original: RV_9,108.16c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divo viṣṭambha uttamaḥ //
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divaḥ viṣṭambhaḥ uttamaḥ

original: RV_9,109.01a pari pra dhanvendrāya soma svādur mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya //
analyzed: pari pra dhanva indrāya soma svāduḥ mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya

original: RV_9,109.02a indras te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ

original: RV_9,109.03a evāmṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukro arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ //
analyzed: eva amṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukraḥ arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ
