original: RV_9,109.04a pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānāṃ viśvābhi dhāma //
analyzed: pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānām viśva abhi dhāma

original: RV_9,109.05a śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śaṃ ca prajāyai //
analyzed: śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śam ca prajāyai

original: RV_9,109.06a divo dhartāsi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva //
analyzed: divaḥ dhartā asi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva

original: RV_9,109.07a pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāro mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ //
analyzed: pavasva soma dyumnī su dhāraḥ mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ

original: RV_9,109.08a nṛbhir yemāno jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarad viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit //
analyzed: nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarat viśvāni mandraḥ svar vid

original: RV_9,109.09a induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karad viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ //
analyzed: induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karat viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ

original: RV_9,109.10a pavasva soma kratve dakṣāyāśvo na nikto vājī dhanāya //
analyzed: pavasva soma kratve dakṣāya aśvaḥ na niktaḥ vājī dhanāya

original: RV_9,109.11a taṃ te sotāro rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya //
analyzed: tam te sotāraḥ rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya

original: RV_9,109.12a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ harim mṛjanti pavitre somaṃ devebhya indum //
analyzed: śiśum jajñānam harim mṛjanti pavitre somam devebhyaḥ indum

original: RV_9,109.13a induḥ paviṣṭa cārur madāyāpām upasthe kavir bhagāya //
analyzed: induḥ paviṣṭa cāruḥ madāya apām upasthe kaviḥ bhagāya

original: RV_9,109.14a bibharti cārv indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna //
analyzed: bibharti cāru indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna

original: RV_9,109.15a pibanty asya viśve devāso gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya //
analyzed: pibanti asya viśve devāsaḥ gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya

original: RV_9,109.16a pra suvāno akṣāḥ sahasradhāras tiraḥ pavitraṃ vi vāram avyam //
analyzed: pra suvānaḥ akṣār sahasra dhāraḥ tiras pavitram vi vāram avyam

original: RV_9,109.17a sa vājy akṣāḥ sahasraretā adbhir mṛjāno gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ //
analyzed: sa vājī akṣār sahasra retāḥ adbhiḥ mṛjānaḥ gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ

original: RV_9,109.18a pra soma yāhīndrasya kukṣā nṛbhir yemāno adribhiḥ sutaḥ //
analyzed: pra soma yāhi indrasya kukṣā nṛbhiḥ yemānaḥ adribhiḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_9,109.19a asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ //
analyzed: asarji vājī tiras pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasra dhāraḥ

original: RV_9,109.20a añjanty enam madhvo rasenendrāya vṛṣṇa indum madāya //
analyzed: añjanti enam madhvaḥ rasena indrāya vṛṣṇe indum madāya

original: RV_9,109.21a devebhyas tvā vṛthā pājase 'po vasānaṃ harim mṛjanti //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ tvā vṛthā pājase po vasānam harim mṛjanti

original: RV_9,109.22a indur indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇann ugro riṇann apaḥ //
analyzed: induḥ indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇan ugraḥ riṇan apaḥ

original: RV_9,110.01a pary ū ṣu pra dhanva vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: pari u su pra dhanva vāja sātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_9,110.01c dviṣas taradhyā ṛṇayā na īyase //
analyzed: dviṣaḥ taradhyai ṛṇayāḥ naḥ īyase

original: RV_9,110.02a anu hi tvā sutaṃ soma madāmasi mahe samaryarājye /
analyzed: anu hi tvā sutam soma madāmasi mahe samarya rājye

original: RV_9,110.02c vājāṃ abhi pavamāna pra gāhase //
analyzed: vājān abhi pavamāna pra gāhase

original: RV_9,110.03a ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ /
analyzed: ajījanaḥ hi pavamāna sūryam vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ

original: RV_9,110.03c gojīrayā raṃhamāṇaḥ purandhyā //
analyzed: go jīrayā raṃhamāṇaḥ purandhyā

original: RV_9,110.04a ajījano amṛta martyeṣv āṃ ṛtasya dharmann amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: ajījanaḥ amṛta martyeṣu ām ṛtasya dharman amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ

original: RV_9,110.04c sadāsaro vājam acchā saniṣyadat //
analyzed: sadā saraḥ vājam acchā saniṣyadat

original: RV_9,110.05a abhy-abhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cij janapānam akṣitam /
analyzed: abhi abhi hi śravasā tatarditha utsam na kam cit jana pānam akṣitam

original: RV_9,110.05c śaryābhir na bharamāṇo gabhastyoḥ //
analyzed: śaryābhiḥ na bharamāṇaḥ gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_9,110.06a ād īṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhy anūṣata /
analyzed: āt īm ke cit paśyamānāsaḥ āpyam vasu rucaḥ divyāḥ abhī anūṣata

original: RV_9,110.06c vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vy ūrṇute //
analyzed: vāram na devaḥ savitā vi ūrṇute

original: RV_9,110.07a tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyaṃ dadhuḥ /
analyzed: tve soma prathamāḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ mahe vājāya śravase dhiyam

original: RV_9,110.07c sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ vīra vīryāya codaya

original: RV_9,110.08a divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyaṃ yad ukthyam maho gāhād diva ā nir adhukṣata /
analyzed: divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyam yat ukthyam mahaḥ gāhāt divaḥ ā niḥ adhukṣata

original: RV_9,110.08c indram abhi jāyamānaṃ sam asvaran //
analyzed: indram abhi jāyamānam sam asvaran

original: RV_9,110.09a adha yad ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanābhi majmanā /
analyzed: adha yat ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanā abhi majmanā

original: RV_9,110.09c yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase //
analyzed: yūthe na niṣṭhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ vi tiṣṭhase

original: RV_9,110.10a somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśur na krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ punānaḥ avyaye vāre śiśuḥ na krīḍan pavamānaḥ akṣār

original: RV_9,110.10c sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja induḥ //
analyzed: sahasra dhāraḥ śata vājaḥ induḥ

original: RV_9,110.11a eṣa punāno madhumāṃ ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ pavate svādur ūrmiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa punānaḥ madhumān ṛtāvā indrāya induḥ pavate svāduḥ ūrmiḥ

original: RV_9,110.11c vājasanir varivovid vayodhāḥ //
analyzed: vāja saniḥ varivaḥ vid vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_9,110.12a sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsy apa durgahāṇi /
analyzed: sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsi apa durgahāṇi

original: RV_9,110.12c svāyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn //
analyzed: su āyudhaḥ sāsahvān soma śatrūn

original: RV_9,111.01a ayā rucā hariṇyā punāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūro na svayugvabhiḥ /
analyzed: ayā rucā hariṇyā punānaḥ viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūraḥ na svayugvabhiḥ

original: RV_9,111.01d dhārā sutasya rocate punāno aruṣo hariḥ /
analyzed: dhārā sutasya rocate punānaḥ aruṣaḥ hariḥ

original: RV_9,111.01f viśvā yad rūpā pariyāty ṛkvabhiḥ saptāsyebhir ṛkvabhiḥ //
analyzed: viśvā yat rūpā pariyāti ṛkvabhiḥ sapta āsyebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ

original: RV_9,111.02a tvaṃ tyat paṇīnāṃ vido vasu sam mātṛbhir marjayasi sva ā dama ṛtasya dhītibhir dame /
analyzed: tvam tyad paṇīnām vidaḥ vasu sam mātṛbhiḥ marjayasi sve ā dame ṛtasya dhītibhiḥ dame

original: RV_9,111.02d parāvato na sāma tad yatrā raṇanti dhītayaḥ /
analyzed: parāvataḥ na sāma tat yatra raṇanti dhītayaḥ

original: RV_9,111.02f tridhātubhir aruṣībhir vayo dadhe rocamāno vayo dadhe //
analyzed: tri dhātubhiḥ aruṣībhiḥ vayaḥ dadhe rocamānaḥ vayaḥ dadhe

original: RV_9,111.03a pūrvām anu pradiśaṃ yāti cekitat saṃ raśmibhir yatate darśato ratho daivyo darśato rathaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvām anu pradiśam yāti cekitat sam raśmibhiḥ yatate darśataḥ rathaḥ daivyaḥ darśataḥ rathaḥ

original: RV_9,111.03d agmann ukthāni pauṃsyendraṃ jaitrāya harṣayan /
analyzed: agman ukthāni pauṃsyā indram jaitrāya harṣayan

original: RV_9,111.03f vajraś ca yad bhavatho anapacyutā samatsv anapacyutā //
analyzed: vajraḥ ca yat bhavathaḥ an apacyutā samatsu an apacyutā

original: RV_9,112.01a nānānaṃ vā u no dhiyo vi vratāni janānām /
analyzed: nānānam vai u naḥ dhiyaḥ vi vratāni janānām

original: RV_9,112.01c takṣā riṣṭaṃ rutam bhiṣag brahmā sunvantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: takṣā riṣṭam rutam bhiṣaj brahmā sunvantam icchati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,112.02a jaratībhir oṣadhībhiḥ parṇebhiḥ śakunānām /
analyzed: jaratībhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ parṇebhiḥ śakunānām

original: RV_9,112.02c kārmāro aśmabhir dyubhir hiraṇyavantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: kārmāraḥ aśmabhiḥ dyubhiḥ hiraṇyavantam icchati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,112.03a kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag upalaprakṣiṇī nanā /
analyzed: kāruḥ aham tatas bhiṣaj upala prakṣiṇī nanā

original: RV_9,112.03c nānādhiyo vasūyavo 'nu gā iva tasthimendrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: nānā dhiyaḥ vasūyavaḥ nu gāḥ iva tasthima indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,112.04a aśvo voḷhā sukhaṃ rathaṃ hasanām upamantriṇaḥ /
analyzed: aśvaḥ voḍhā sukham ratham hasanām upamantriṇaḥ

original: RV_9,112.04c śepo romaṇvantau bhedau vār in maṇḍūka icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: śepaḥ romaṇvantau bhedau vār id maṇḍūkaḥ icchati indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.01a śaryaṇāvati somam indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā /
analyzed: śaryaṇāvati somam indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā

original: RV_9,113.01c balaṃ dadhāna ātmani kariṣyan vīryam mahad indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: balam dadhānaḥ ātmani kariṣyan vīryam mahat indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.02a ā pavasva diśām pata ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ /
analyzed: ā pavasva diśām pate ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ

original: RV_9,113.02c ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā suta indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā sutaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.03a parjanyavṛddham mahiṣaṃ taṃ sūryasya duhitābharat /
analyzed: parjanya vṛddham mahiṣam tam sūryasya duhitā abharat

original: RV_9,113.03c taṃ gandharvāḥ praty agṛbhṇan taṃ some rasam ādadhur indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: tam gandharvāḥ prati agṛbhṇan tam some rasam ādadhuḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.04a ṛtaṃ vadann ṛtadyumna satyaṃ vadan satyakarman /
analyzed: ṛtam vadan ṛta dyumna satyam vadan satya karman

original: RV_9,113.04c śraddhāṃ vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛta indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: śraddhām vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛtaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.05a satyamugrasya bṛhataḥ saṃ sravanti saṃsravāḥ /
analyzed: satyam ugrasya bṛhataḥ sam sravanti saṃsravāḥ

original: RV_9,113.05c saṃ yanti rasino rasāḥ punāno brahmaṇā hara indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: sam yanti rasinaḥ rasāḥ punānaḥ brahmaṇā haraḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.06a yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyāṃ vācaṃ vadan /
analyzed: yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyām vācam vadan

original: RV_9,113.06c grāvṇā some mahīyate somenānandaṃ janayann indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: grāvṇā some mahīyate somena ānandam janayan indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.07a yatra jyotir ajasraṃ yasmiṃl loke svar hitam /
analyzed: yatra jyotiḥ ajasram yasmin loke svar hitam

original: RV_9,113.07c tasmin māṃ dhehi pavamānāmṛte loke akṣita indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: tasmin mām dhehi pavamāna amṛte loke akṣite indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.08a yatra rājā vaivasvato yatrāvarodhanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: yatra rājā vaivasvataḥ yatra avarodhanam divaḥ

original: RV_9,113.08c yatrāmūr yahvatīr āpas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: yatra amūḥ yahvatīḥ āpaḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.09a yatrānukāmaṃ caraṇaṃ trināke tridive divaḥ /
analyzed: yatra anukāmam caraṇam trināke tridive divaḥ

original: RV_9,113.09c lokā yatra jyotiṣmantas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: lokāḥ yatra jyotiṣmantaḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.10a yatra kāmā nikāmāś ca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam /
analyzed: yatra kāmāḥ nikāmāḥ ca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam

original: RV_9,113.10c svadhā ca yatra tṛptiś ca tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: svadhā ca yatra tṛptiḥ ca tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,113.11a yatrānandāś ca modāś ca mudaḥ pramuda āsate /
analyzed: yatra ānandāḥ ca modāḥ ca mudaḥ pramudaḥ āsate

original: RV_9,113.11c kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmās tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: kāmasya yatra āptāḥ kāmāḥ tatra mām amṛtam kṛdhi indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,114.01a ya indoḥ pavamānasyānu dhāmāny akramīt /
analyzed: yaḥ indoḥ pavamānasya anu dhāmāni akramīt

original: RV_9,114.01c tam āhuḥ suprajā iti yas te somāvidhan mana indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: tam āhuḥ suprajāḥ iti yaḥ te soma avidhat manaḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,114.02a ṛṣe mantrakṛtāṃ stomaiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣe mantra kṛtām stomaiḥ kaśyapa udvardhayan giraḥ

original: RV_9,114.02c somaṃ namasya rājānaṃ yo jajñe vīrudhām patir indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: somam namasya rājānam yaḥ jajñe vīrudhām patiḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,114.03a sapta diśo nānāsūryāḥ sapta hotāra ṛtvijaḥ /
analyzed: sapta diśaḥ nānā sūryāḥ sapta hotāraḥ ṛtvijaḥ

original: RV_9,114.03c devā ādityā ye sapta tebhiḥ somābhi rakṣa na indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: devāḥ ādityāḥ ye sapta tebhiḥ soma abhi rakṣa naḥ indrāya indo pari srava

original: RV_9,114.04a yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ havis tena somābhi rakṣa naḥ /
analyzed: yat te rājam śṛtam haviḥ tena soma abhi rakṣa naḥ

original: RV_9,114.04c arātīvā mā nas tārīn mo ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamad indrāyendo pari srava //
analyzed: arātīvā mā naḥ tārīt mā u ca naḥ kim cana amamat indrāya indo pari srava
